112.content:
Bulma Briefs flew in her wasp looking spaceship towards Roshi's island. She had a confident smile on her face as she landed the ship, grabbed a few contraptions and walked over to Roshi, asleep on the hammock.

"Wake up, old man! Where's Krillin," she beamed. "Huh?" asked Roshi unaware of what was going on outside his slumber. "He's in the house," Roshi pointed, falling back to sleep.

Bulma rushed into the house as Krillin, 18, and Marron were about to enjoy a home cooked meal. "Hey, Bulma," said Krillin, "What brings you here?" "Well, Krillin," said Bulma, "For your information, I just invented something that will change your life forever. You know what it is like to be the small warrior that always gets beat up all the time. I invented a device that will make you as tall as Piccolo and as strong as Goku." "Piccolo, Goku?" said Krillin, "I'm kinda satisfied of the way I am right now, Bulma, aside from the short jokes. Goku's the real hero."

"Why don't you, Krillin," asked 18 crossing her arms, "Then you could take more of the credit for saving the day! I'll do it!" "Well, unfortunately, it hasn't been tested on androids. Not yet anyway," said Bulma in a sorrowful tone, "But, I don't think it would hurt to try." Krillin protested, "18, what if something goes wrong? You could be killed!" "Silence, Krillin," she snapped, "If you weren't such a coward." Bulma fired up the machine and aimed it at 18, "I hope this works!"
112.title: Krillin the coward

choices: 18 takes the family out on a trip to the city
1122.content:
The beam would normally work as planned, but the framework of 18's cybernetics amplified the growth, making her grow, and grow, and grow. Her clothes grew with her, and she was in her normal clothes and flip flops.

She was about 100 feet tall, give or take a couple. She might in fact be larger. Wether she would grow again from there was unknown. She looked down at poor little Krillin, scared out of his mind. She couldn't hurt him, no matter how short or weak he was. He was her loving husband after all. And there was Marron, the living proof that love is greater than logic.

"Amazing..." Bulma says.

"Momma..." Marron didn't know what to believe, seeing her own mother grow like that.

"Honey? Can you hear me!?" Krillin yells, hoping she would hear her.

"You don't have to shout. I'm an android, remember?" she reminded him about her heightened senses. She also had a rush of power. Not even Goku at his Super Saiyan 3 level could harm her now. The mighty Broly would tremble before her. But she felt humble, calm, every bit as human as ever.

What happens next?
1122.title: The Almighty Android

11221.content:
While the people on the island were coming to grips with what had just happened, the majority of the Z crew were heading towards Kame house.
Goku and Gohan were heading to see Krillin, Goten and Trunks were tagging along, they hadn't seen Marron in some time and were wanting to teach her how to use her Ki. Vegeta, who had met up with the Son's was searching for his 'mate', he had once again destroyed the GR and required Bulma to fix it again. She had told him she would be visiting Kame house.
Yamcha had caught up with the other over one of the many islands. He too wanted to see Krillin and his family.

As the group approached the island they saw something that did not look right in accordance with her surroundings.

"Um...Dad, am I going crazy or do you see a giant android 18 up ahead?" Gohan asked Goku.

"No, I would definately say that's 18."

Krillin had already sensed the Crews Ki levels and was perparing himself to what was about to happen.

As soon as the gang landed, Goku, Gohan and Vegeta started the barrage of questions against Krillin and Bulma. Goten and Trunks looked in silent awe at the now huge 18. Yamcha on the other hand had a look of sheer terror. His last encounter with androids 19 and 20 ended up with him having a section of his chest removed by force. If he had not been the prideful guy he was, he would have pissed himself.

"So, what happened here Krillin, why is 18 so big?" inquired Gohan.

"That would be my fault." answered Bulma. "I was testing a new invetion on 18 and this was the result."
"Forget about the giant robot, woman" snarled Vegeta. "I need you to fix the GR"

18 slammed her foot down next to Vegeta, the ground cracking under the force. " WHAT did you just call me, Vegeta?" asked 18 in her icy tone.
"I called you a robot"

Krillin knew what was about to happen, grabbing Marron he flew into the sky above 18.
A moment later 18's foot collided with Vegeta, sending him into the ocean.

Landing Krillin noticed that Goten and Trunks were still flying around his wife. 'Man, this place is just getting too crowded.'

"Hey," everyone turned to look at Krillin, 18 just tilted her head to look at her husband, "Why don't we go somewhere else, somewhere that can fit us all." Glancing up at his wife.
Marron, Goten and Trunks instantly screamed the West City Park. Goku, Yamcha and Gohan were in favour of the mountain area surrounding their house.
Bulma, and the now very angry, very wet Vegeta decided to head back to CC. Bulma would notify the others when she found the cure for 18's prdicament. After she finished fixing the GR for Vegeta.

Where do the others go?
11221.title: The Z Crew Arrives

After much diliberation, and a few pouts from the kids, the gang decided to head for the mountain area surrounding the Son house. The main reason was the panic 18 could cause if she were to enter West city.

As they took off Krillin and Marron were being held by 18. She Smiled down at them as she followed Goku and the others.

The 439 mountain region was very quiet, the serene landscape told those who approached that their was no real modern civilisation in the area.

Chi Chi was currently hanging out the laundry as a shadow pasted over her. Looking up she saw that the cloud was actually a very large Android 18. Chi Chi's scream could be heard for kilometres around. It echoed off the mountains. Goku landed and quickly hushed his wife. "Chi, it's okay, 18 had a 'small' accident, she's not going to harm us.

18 sat down softly and gently lowered her family to the ground.

As the kids went off to play the the men started to discuss what was going to happen concerning 18 and how Krillin felt about the situation.

Chi Chi, Videl, who happened to have arrived at the Son house shortly after Gohan left and 18 discussed what 18 was going through and what it felt like to be a giantess.

122.content:
Mai's duel disk strapped into place as she stood opposite Yami Marik on the dueling arena. The ancient evil one smirked with self-confidence; there was no way this girl would prevent him from entering the Battle City finals. He needed to duel Yugi and Kaiba to retrieve their Egyptian God cards.

However, a new plan ocurred to him...

"Hey, you ready to duel, pycho?" Mai asked impatiently.

"Actually," Yami Marik replied, grinning. "I'd like to make things more interesting. How about a wager?"

"What kind of wager?" Mai asked cautiously.

"If I win, you must serve as one of my Rare Hunters, until you can steal Yugi's God Card for me," Yami Marki replied. "However, if you win, I will use my shadow magic to grant you that desire that I know is buried within your heart..."

"You'll make me the strongest duelist ever?"

"There will be none stronger."

Mai considered....this guy was a pushover who hid behind his little cronies! No way she could loose to him!

"Deal!"



The duel was over so fast Mai swore she missed something. Yami Marik played nothing but weak monsters, and all in attack mode. Her Harpies Ladies and Amazon cards ripped them apart with no trouble. He didn't even play any traps!

"Well, looks like I loose," Marik said with mock saddness.

"Remember, we had a deal," Mai reminded him.

"But...of course!" Marik grinned evily, then took out his Millenium Item, the Millenium Rod. A huge shadow engulfed Mai.

"Hey!"

When the shadow faded away, Mai was disoriented and naked. With a scream, she covered herself with her hands. Where was she?

She looked down, and saw...buildings?

Mai Valentie was 200 feet tall in the middle of battle city.


Yami marik had the good sense to be far away when his spell was completed. He laughed. "Let's see Yugi when this tournament when he's got a problem like this on his hands!"


"What?!" Mai shoted, her voice breaking several windows. "What did you do?! I wanted to be the strongest duelist ever!"

*And you are* Marik's voice said inside her head. *There's not a duelist in the world who can match your strength. Oh...that's not what you meant? I'm sorry; you'll have to specify next time! Hahaha!*

"Creepy little jerk..." Mai muttered. She took a moment to examine her new surroundings....she liked them...
122.title: Deal with a Devil

1221.content:
Yugi and friends were eating lunch in a cafe. Dueling pros like Weevil and Rex Raptor is hard work, and can build up an appetite. Especially if your name is; Joey Wheeler.

"Joey, that's your 4th burger." said Yugi as he looked at Joey. "When I said I'd pay for lunch I figured you'd know I'm not made of money."

"Yeah, easy big guy." said Tristin as he snatched the burger, leaving Joey to chomp his teeth together on thin air.

"Hey! I was gonna eat that!" said Joey as he groped futily for the burger as Tristin scarfed it down. Joey sighed. Suddenly there was a crashing noise and what sounded like an explosion. The earth shook causing everyone to fall down.

"What the heck was that?!" Asked Joey as he climbed back on his feet. Tristin was looking out the window. He froze up.

"Tristin? What's-- WHOAH!!" Outside the window they could see a 200ft tall naked Mai Valentine heading their way. If not for the fact that they doubted Mai would hurt them, they would have joined the screaming panicking crowd of people running away.




Mai looked down at the mob of panicking people. Amidst the crowd she could see 4 people standing perfectly still through a window. It was Yugi, and his friends.
1221.title: One big, hot, naked problem...

choices: He STILL doesn't believe Mai's real.
12211.content:
The three of them quickly rushed outside to see Mai in the middle of the street, and panicked crowds running away as fast as they possibly could.
"Yugi, do, do you see that?" asked a stunned Tristan.
"I do, but I don't believe it!"
"What are you two talking about?" shouted Joey. "There's no way that's Mai! For one thing, she looks too thin."
"Uh, Joey?"
"What is it, Yug? I know what's real, and that isn't real!"
"You idiot!" screamed Tristan. "She can hear you!" Sure enough, when Joey looked behind him, he saw Mai's face with a rather...annoyed expression.
"I warned him," shrugged Tristan as he ate his burger.
12211.title: Joey's skeptisism

122112.content:
Joey looked striaght into the eyes of the giant Mai, then turned back to Yugi and Tristan.
"It's a trick. I can tell."
Before Yugi and Tristan could protest, Joey started inspecting the area around Mai, and hitting parts of her feet. Yugi and Tristan just sweatdropped, while Mai looked at the tiny bug around her feet.
"Look, Joey, I really don't..."
"Let him go, Yugi. It's the only way he'll learn."
Joey, who if he was a normal person would probably had realized the truth at this point, continued inspecting parts of Mai and the surrounding are for proof that she wasn't real.
"I bet it's one of those fancy holograms Kaiba uses for duels. The machine should be around her somewhere." Then Joey did something that no sane person would have done. He started trying to climb Mai's leg.
"Joey! What the hell are you doing?"
"Tristian, relax! She's not real! It's just a statue! See? It's not like she can feel me!"
Unfortunately for Joey, the next thing Yugi and Tristan noticed was Mai's hand approaching Joey. He was about to eat his words, and probably his teeth at the same time.
122112.title: Is he stupid, or is the just the dub?

choices: Mai is interrupted by Battle City law. (Kaiba or his suits)
1221122.content:
As Mai flicked Joey off her leg, with a little more force than nessecary, he went flying into a brick wall. She then gave him a, "Hmmph" to show that not only is she real, she's pissed.

"You just know he's gonna feel that tomorrow." said Tristin who then took a gulp of his soda.

"You can say that again." Yugi added. Tea was silent and staring blankly at the scene before her, as if her mind had snapped like a brittle twig in the breeze.

"I'm expecting an apology Wheeler!" Mai said angrily, hurting everyone's ears. Joey was burried under a pile of dirt that he went flying into head first. Hey, consider him lucky, there was a manuer truck right next to the dirt pile that he hit.

"Sorry..." said a somewhat conscious and very disoriented Joey, "Won't happen again... oh man... my head."

"Mai, what happened?" asked Yugi.
1221122.title: He had it coming.

choices: They pissed off the wrong 200 foot tall naked blonde...
12211222.content:
Mai bent down to make sure that she could see Yugi instead of just his hair. Slowly, she started to explain what happened.
"Well, you see Yugi..."
Before Mai could even start her story, the noise of police cars could be heard. Turning around, Yugi and the others noticed a squad of Kaiba's security force stepping out. One had a bullhorn and began shouting.
"By the order of Battle City director Seto Kaiba, everyone is to clear the area!" When he saw that people weren't moving, he raised a gun and started firing into the air, causing people to panic.
With the crowd gone, he looked straight at the gigantic Mai.
"You're under arrest! Come with us immediately!"
"On what charges?" angry responded Mai. It's not like this guy could just boss her around.
"Disturbing the peace, interrupting several duels in the city, and public nudity. Come with us right now or else!"
12211222.title: Do we get paid extra for this?

choices: she let the cops get away and tells her story
They're not getting off that easy.
122112222.content:
Mai's whole world had been hell ever since she met Marik. She was pissed off and things kept getting annoying, bad then worse. Just like a stick of dynamite, you can only cut the whick so short until...
"THAT'S IT!! I'VE HAD ENOUGH!" Shouted Mai angrily. She kicked the cars and many of the officers and sent them flying, some of them probably won't be able to move for a while others were not so fortunate.
"Ya know what..." said the leading officer.
"What?"
"I think this chick's out of our jurisdiction! Retreat!!!" they got in their cars and sped off as fast as they could.

**************************************************

Meanwhile, Kaiba was watching the mess from the Kaiba Corp. headquarters.
"Imbeciles... every last one of them." He said somewhat angry, but mostly annoyed.
"Maybe we need to try a different aproach Seto." Mokuba said not able to take his eyes off the screen. Kaiba hit a button after noticing Mokuba's expression. Now the image was censored.
"What we need, Mokuba, are more officers with enough guts to actually follow orders... that and a couple of tanks."

**************************************************

Meanwhile as Mai watched the cars speed off...
122112222.title: Pissed off giantess.

choices: Mai is finally able to explain it
Kaiba shows up, interupting her AGAIN
1221122222.content:
The cars started to get away as fast as they could, but Mai wasn't done with them yet.
"Get back here! You think you can just come in and threaten me? Not anymore!"
Mai started to chase the cars which were trying to get away at full speed. Yugi tried to follow her, but Tristian stopped him.
"Let her get it out of her system Yugi."
"She might kill them!"
"I don't think Mai would KILL them. Horribly cripple them, maybe. Remove their legs? Possibly. But I don't think she's capable of murder."
Yugi fell down when he heard this. Hard. When he got back up, he saw Tristian running off.
"I'm going to go find, Joey, Yugi. Make sure Mai didn't do anything permanent by accident."

*************************************************

Kaiba didn't like what he saw. After running a picture through the Battle City database, he found the identity of the mystery woman. Mai Valentine, a 4-star duelist who made it to the semifinals in Duelist Kingdom. So it was only natrual for him to assume one thing.
"She's after Obelisk! I just know it!"
"Somehow I don't think this is about your card Kaiba."
Kaiba sighed as he looked at his little brother Mokuba. She was nowhere near the command building, and looked more like she was venting rage rather than pursuing an agenda.
"Then why is she here?" Observing the cameras, he noticed two things. One was that his hated rival Yugi Moto was in the area. The second was that Mokuba had turned off the camera filter and was looking at Mai's naked body as she crushed a car in her hand. Not one to wait for things to get done, or to let his little brother watch porn, he got up.
"Come on Mokuba," commanded Kaiba as he dragged Mokuba away from the TV. "Yugi's in the area. And I can tell that this is all somehow connected.

*************************************************

Mai had just finished dealing with the squad cars, convientely placing them inside their broken cars on top of one building. Somehow, Trisitan was right, since none of them were actually dead. She kneeled over Yugi, Trisitan, a blank Tea, and a dirt covered Joey.
"Sorry about that Yugi, I just needed to get some frusturation out."
"Sure," replied Yugi. "But Mai, what happened to you?"
1221122222.title: One big case of PMS

choices: Kaiba starts pointing fingers at Yugi.
12211222222.content:
"Well, I was in the middle-" began Mai.

"Yugi! Just what the hell is going on here?!" asked Kaiba in his usual tone as he walked up to the area, closely followed by Mokuba who was now intimidated since he was no longer so far away from the one who almost killed all the guards.

"We're trying to let Mai explain what's going on, but somehow you and your goons keep innerruptin' us." said Joey as he marched right into Kaiba's face. "I oughtta knock your lights out right now for bein such a pain in the but!"

"Don't tempt me Wheeler." said Kaiba as he shoved Joey aside. Mokuba continued to follow Kaiba, almost clinging to him.
12211222222.title: Kaiba interrupts again.

choices: Kaiba lets her tell her story
122112222222.content:
Mai was about to talk before Kaiba raised a finger into the air. Everyone was wondering what he was doing, untill he pointed it right at Yugi.
"This is your doing, isn't it Yugi?"
Taken aback by this, Yugi looked at Kaiba. He seemed dead serious.
"You and this monster are plotting against me!"
"Now listen Kaiba," responded Yugi, "I didn't do anything! She was just about to..."
"Shut up! You want Obelisk! Or maybe the big bitch is just working for Marik.
Mai had been watching the back and forth between Yugi and Kaiba first confused, then annoyed, and finally when Kaiba called her a bitch, enraged. She picked Kaiba up off the ground and started shouting at him.
"Will you stop being an ass? I was going to explain to everyone what happened, before you came in with your stupid threats! Now if you interrupt me again, I'm going to have raw duelist for lunch!"
Mokuba looked on worried as Kaiba struggeled. Neither of them were sure what Mai was capable of.
122112222222.title: Pointless accusations

choices: "Maybe just this once, only until she's back to normal!"
1221122222221.content:
Kaiba was about to protest when Mokuba started hiding behind Joey for protection. After seeing this Kaiba finally shut his trap.

"Fine. I'll listen." muttered Kaiba through clenched teeth. Mai put Kaiba down and then lay down on her stomach so that her face could be level with everyone elses, and began telling her story.

"I knew it! Marik is somehow involved in this... he's after Obelisk!"

"Jeez Kaiba, everything's a conspiracy with you. You're worse then one of them Roswell Fanatics." said Joey.

"You shut up Wheeler! Marik clearly did this for a reason, he wouldn't have lost to such a pathetic excuse for a duelist if he didn't intend to on purpose!" Kaiba shouted in Joey's face. Everyone cast a nervous glance to Mai except for Kaiba who was too busy shouting at Joey. Mai seemed angry but didn't do anything for the moment. She might accidentally hit Yugi or his friends instead of just Kaiba.

"Kaiba, I do admit that Marik probably did this on purpose. But, whatever the reason we'll have to work together if we want to find him and get Mai back to normal." Yugi said.

"Hah! That's rich Yugi, me working with you. Not even if my life depended on it." Kaiba said as he turned to leave. Just then, Mai's giant hand came down like a fleshy wall just infront of Kaiba. It caused Kaiba to fall off his feet and to the ground because of the wind it created and because of the tremor in the ground.

"You're life may just very well depend on it rich punk." Mai shouted hurting everyone's ears yet again, mostly Kaiba's though.

Kaiba thinks for about a split second and says...
1221122222221.title: A story told and a life spared.

choices: She decides to get a little...creative

Mokuba looked horrifed while Joey and the others just looked. As CEO of his own coporation, as a champion duelist, and as a brother, Kaiba was always known for being stubborn. And time after time, whether it'd be buisness buyouts, insane corporate rivals with mystic charms, or gigantic nude women, he wouldn't change for anyone.

Tristen just nodded. At least Joey learned his lesson. And judging by Mai's expression, she was about to teach Kaiba one he'd never forget!

Ignores Mokuba and returns to harming Kaiba.

"You asked for it!" Mai angrily shouted as she proceeded to squeeze Kaiba. Not with all her strength but enough so that if Kaiba was a normal person, he'd be screaming in pain.

"Joey! Come on man, even you can't be that cold." Tristin complaind.

Mai increased the strength of her grip on Kaiba causing him to finally show that he's in excrutiating pain. He screamed in pain as Mai smiled that evil grin she gets.

Mokuba rushed forward, knocking Joey down.

"Stop it! You're hurting him!" Mokuba shouted as tears began forming in his eyes.

"It's kind of the point." Mai said not bothering to look away from the face of her current victim.

"Mokuba-AH! St-AAAARGH-stay out of this. AAAAHH!!"

"Please, stop it! You're gonna kill him! Grrr... LEAVE MY BIG BROTHER ALONE!!" Mokuba lost control and ran forward and began kicking at Mai. She looked down and loosened her grip on Kaiba without noticing so. It didn't hurt, heck, it barely even tickled her. She...
122112222222121.title: Pain, pain, and more pain. I like that word. PAIN!

1221122222221211.content:
Mai kept squeezing Kaiba, and Joey was enjoying every second of it. That was, untill Mokuba started hitting Mai unrelentingly. She could barely feel it, but when she saw that two minutes later, he was still doing it. To the surprise of everyone, she picked up Mokuba and dangled him over the ground.

Mai just grinned. "I'm not a bully, kid, but after what I've been through, anyone would be a little cranky."

"What are you going to do to me?"

"Let me down from here!"
"Will you help me out?" asked Mai. "Because if not, you can find your own damn way down."
1221122222221211.title: Little spirit

Kaiba attempted to find his own way down, but each time he started climbing, Mai would put him right back where he started.

"STOP IT!" He finally shouted after being re-placed at the top of the building for the 13th time.

"You know what'll make me stop." Mai said nonchalantly.

"Alright, alright, fine... I'll help you all out... FOR NOW! Know this Mai, as soon as you're back to normal this alliance is over!" Kaiba said with pure hatred in his voice... then again, his voice always sounds full of hatred except when he's speaking to Mokuba.

"Kaiba, any ideas how we can track Marik?" Yugi asked. Mai lay down on her stomach again.

"He has a duel disk, all of them have a tracking device in them for anti-theft purposes. We can use it to find Marik. In order to find him though, we'll need his duelist ID-" Kaiba began. He was interupted by Mai.

"WE DON'T HAVE IT!" she shouted.

"I WASN'T FINISHED YOU SKANK! Now, as I was saying, we'll need his duelist ID OR we can enter in Mai's duelist ID and see who she last dueled. After seeing that we'll know Marik's ID and can find his location anywhere within Domino City's limits." Kaiba said. Mai had been looking at Kaiba like she wanted to tear his arms off like the wings of a fly, but she held back her urge for now since she needed Kaiba to track down Marik.

"Alright, if it's that easy then let's go!" said Tea.

The gang set off for Kaiba Corp. and...

Unknown to our heroes, one other person had stayed behind when Mai first stepped into town. One of Marik's henchmen, the Rare Hunters, was spying on the group, and had heard everything.
"Lord Marik, can you hear me?"
Although no one was there, a voice responded. "I hear you hunter. Report!"

"Now go. Head to the building. Make sure they don't leave alive. I'm sending two of my best hunters to deal with Yugi and Kaiba."
"And the woman?"
"Soon she will be under my power. She may have escaped us once but she will not again."

Kaiba Yugi & etc. kik the crap out of them

They engaged in battle and...

Of all the things Kaiba could say at this point, that was probably the dumbest. Serenity's a nice girl and all, but now Kaiba's crossed the line. Staring at him with a combination of rage and mischeviousness, she decides

choices: Play it safe, put the girls on a perscription of shrink pills

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Soon enough, everyone arrived at the Kaiba corp building. Wasting no time, everyone got to work. The three girls were whisked off to a lab, Yugi and the others were sent to a waiting room, and Kaiba went and took a long cold shower.
About two hours later, Kaiba met up with his science team, eager to have the results of the testing.

"Well?"

"Well you see Mr. Kaiba," began one of the scientists, "we've run into a slight snafuu."

"Snafuu? SNAFUU!?" Kaiba's outburst alerted all the staff on his floor to the argument that was unfolding.

"I don't pay you good money for a 'snafuu!' I pay for results!"

"M, m, Mr. Kaiba please let me explain!" began the shivering scientist.

"You have 2 minutes. Make it quick."

"Well, to be blunt, we can't permantely unshrink the girls through normal means..."

"WHAT?!" Kaiba's voice once again rang clear through the complex, frightening the group of scientists and engineers that were on the floor.

"Sir! We looked into it. Their metabolisms, bodily fuctions, they're all wrong!"

"How so?"

"The bodily functions have adapted perfectly to their new sizes. The girl's bodies don't want to be shrunken. If we did shrink them with drugs, the effects would be temporary at best. They'd have to be put on drugs for the rest of their lives, drugs that they could eventually become impervious to."

Kaiba groaned. The idea of Mai staying 100 feet tall for the rest of her life did not appeal to him in the least bit.

"However," continued the scientist, "there may be an unconventional solution."

Kaiba'se eyes widened. Maybe today wouldn't be so bad after all.

"Tell me."

"Using a combination of drugs and rapid radition treatments, we can seriously disrupt their metabolic functions, enabling us to perfom the shrinking operation permanetly. But..."

"There's always a 'but,' isn't there? What is it?"

"There could be two possible side effects. One, the servere metabolic imbalances kill the girls. Two..."

"Two?" asked Kaiba confused.

"It may have the exact opposite effect, making the girls larger instead of smaller."

That last possible side effect was enough to make Kaiba wet his pants if he hadn't been standing in front of his staff. What could be worse than a huge Mai? An even bigger one!

"Of course, the final decision is up to you on which plan we go ahead with."
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: "Snafuu?!"

Kaiba entered the lounge to contemplate his decision. Normally it was a secluded place, but...

"YUGI! JOEY!! TRISTEN!! What are you three doing in here!! Joey... get the hell away from my candy machine!" Kaiba shouted. Joey walked away from the machine, grumbling to himself.

"Hey," Tristen began. "is that any way to talk to your future brother in law?"

"Don't make me snap your neck like a toothpick Tristen." Kaiba said. "How did you three get in here?! This is my personal room where I can be alone with my thoughts."

"Do you use your left hand or your right hand for that?" Joey asked smirking. Kaiba just sighed.

"Am I just cursed to have to deal with you three for all eternity, or is this just not my day?" Kaiba asked rhetorichally. (I think that's how it's spelled.)

"Look on the bright side, Kaiba. At least now you don't smell like rancid-"

"ENOUGH!!" Kaiba shouted, interrupting Joey.

"What's up Kaiba?" asked Yugi. Kaiba explained the situation and his dilemna. "Whoah... so, what you gonna do?"

"Well, this story would suck if I didn't decide to do something rash and dangerous with possible permanent side affects, so, I'm going to try the whole combination of drugs and rapid radiation treatments."

"So, you're going to endanger the girls lives just to help your pride?" asked Yugi.

"Nope, just Mai's. Then if it works, the other girls. If it works, I'm a genius. If it fails, then it's Henning's fault." said Kaiba. (Henning's is the Kaiba Corp. lead scientist who was telling Kaiba all the possibilities.)

**************************************************

Mai was hooked up in the lab. Everything was ready, the scientists gave Mai some very large pills and a gigantic glass of warm milk to down them with. The room was filled with radiation, and all the scientists were in radiation suits. Kaiba, Joey, Yugi, Tristen, Tea, and Serenity were watching the proceedings unfold.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Chaos in Kaiba's work space.

choices: It stops, leaving the girls 300 feet tall.
It keeps going, making them larger than that!
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
All of the scientists got to their stations. With the power on the radition lights activated, everyone donned their protective suits. Everyone except for the Serenity and Tea, who both wore sheets on them.

"Are you sure it's smart for us not to have protective gear?" asked Tea.

"You'll be fine!" responded one of the scientists. "The wall is two feet thick. It's designed to repel radition and the gas we're going to flood into the room. Luckily for you, the room itself is quite spacious to allow for mulitple experiments to occur."

Serenity sighed as she saw Mai on the operation table. With a thumbs-up, the gas was flooded into the room, and the radition lights were activated, sending radition into the room.

"Cough, this doesn't seem, healty!"

"Try to relax Miss Valentine," commented Henning from his workstation. "Everything is going perfectly." Turning to Kaiba in the seat next to him, he showed a face of dread. "Something's horribly wrong."

"WHAT? YOU IDIOT! What happened?!"

"Her metabolism isn't increasing fast enough, but her pituitary gland is pumping out hormones like there's no tommorow. She's getting larger Mr. Kaiba."

As Kaiba turned around, his fears were starting to take shape. Mai's body quickly outgrew the bonds that held her, snapping them on the floor. Her face was panicked.

"Hey! This is happening the wrong way! I'm supposed to get smaller, not bigger!"

"Shut it off you idiot!" shouted Kaiba.

"It's on automatic", the panicked Henning replied as he fiddled with the controls. "I can't stop it!"

Everyone watched in awe from the observation room. But unknown to the scientists inside, there was a large crack in the wall, leaking the combination of gas and radiation since the experiment began. Conviently, no one noticed until Tea and Serenity shredded their makeshift clothes with the clothes.

"Ah! What's happening?!" shouted Serenity.

"Protect us? Yeah right..."

The scientists and the guys, with no way of being able to stop the automated process, could only watch in awe as the girls grew larger.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: The BIG screwup

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
About three minutes later, the gas canisters emptied and the radiation lights dimmed, signifying that the process had finished. When the smoke cleared, it revealed Mai, Serenity, and Tea 300 feet tall, and the labratory in utter shambles.

Yugi quickly removed his protective helmet only to see the sight of three naked 300 foot tall giantesses in front of him. The sight was more than enough to give him a nosebleed, which he quickly attempted to cover. Joey did notice Yugi's nosebleed, laughing at his reaction.

"Oh, come on Yugi, it ain't so ba..." as his train of thought was interrupted by the sight of Mai and Tea huge and naked. He promptly began nosebleeding as well. Tristen followed a few seconds later along with Kaiba's experimenters.

Pretty soon everyone in the vicinity had nosebleeds except for Seto Kaiba and Dr. Hennings, and that was only because one was screaming at the other, not bothering to notice the girls.

"YOU IDIOT! WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?!"

"It was a slight miscalculation, Mr. Kaiba! Please don't hurt me!"

"That isn't slight! That's..." began Kaiba as he turned to see the sight of a 300 foot tall naked Serenity. Despite summoning all of his willpower, he couldn't help but have a nosebleed as well. This did not sit well with the girls."

"They screw up royally, and now all they can do is look at us naked?" began Tea.

Mai shrugged her shoulders. "Perverts. I know I'm beatiful, but this is beyond belief."

*************************************************

After wiping the blood from the floor, everyone met to discuss their options.

"Well, Dr. Stupid over here screwed up royally," began Kaiba as he pointed at Henning. Any other ideas?"

Yugi sighed. "Isn't there anyone we could ask for help?"

Kaiba smacked his forehead,partily out of annyonance, partily out of his own ego. "There is no one else. No other company has our resources in these matters."

"Maybe we can get Pegasus to help," suggested Joey. "He owes us big time for not exposing him. And he's got a lot of resources."

"Pegasus is dead Wheeler." angrily replied Kaiba.

"No, he's not. He was just sick."

"He's dead. The dub screwed up his scene, but he's dead." To prove his point, Kaiba took out a laptop from the table and went into his files. A video played of his death at Bakura's hands, his funeral, and his morgue records.

"See what I mean?"

Joey sighed. "I see it. Damn 4Kids."

"Actually, reports of my demise have been greatly exadgerated." a man said as he walked into the building. Everyone turned around to see a white haired man with an eyepatch on his forehead.

"Pegasus!" everyone shouted in unison, some out of joy, others (Kaiba) from frustration.

"Didn't you die?" he grunted.

"Well, in the original I did, but in the American dub they cut that out so by the loophole that created, here I stand before you all in near perfect health."

"What do you mean near?" asked Tristen.

Pegasus moved his hair revealing that he was wearing an eye patch where his millenium eye would be.

"I can guarantee you that no-one will want to know the details behind the eye patch. So, how can I be of service?"
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: A ray of hope through a dub mistake

choices: They make it to the island uneventfully (they don't puke)
They're too sea sick and a funny scene insues.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
"Help?" Kaiba asked sarcastically. "As if we would need-" Kaiba was cut off as Mai grabbed him and glared. "It depends Mr. Pegasus, what is it that you can do to help us?" Kaiba said an a much friendlier tone with a forced smile on his face. Mai put him down then lightly patted his head, much to his annoyance/anger.

"Huh?" Pegasus replied, as he was only half paying attention to Kaiba. Mostly he was glancing at the three nude giantesses. But, he, unlike everyone else, had not suffered a nosebleed so to the girls it wasn't obvious that he was staring at them. "Sorry, I wasn't listening."

"Is there anything you can do to help us?" Yugi asked Pegasus.

"I won't know until I try Yugi-boy." Pegasus replied with his usual tone.

"Hey," Joey began as he walked up to Pegasus. "Do you ever answer a question directly, or do you just throw out cryptic responses to set the mysterious mood of the show?"

"I think you know the answer to that." was all Pegasus said as he gave a grin.

**************************************************

A short hour later, Pegasus was transporting everyone to the island where the Duelist Kingdom tournament had occured. They were aboard an aircraft carrier he had recently purchased. Who knows why? You know how eccentric rich old people are.

"So, do you really think you can get the girls back to normal?" Yugi asked as he sat down across from Pegasus.

"Well, it will be difficult now that Kaiba messed things up. Honestly, that boy's ego is so big it's a wonder the earth hasn't started orbiting around it in actuality instead of just in his world." Pegasus said noncholantly as he turned the page of his favorite graphic novel. "We should be able to find some way to reverse what he's done though. Don't worry, but you realize that after this we're even."

"I know Pegasus, I know."

**************************************************

Meanwhile, on deck...

"Ohhh... when are we getting there?" asked a sea-sick Serenity. All the giantesses were sitting on the aircraft carrier where the planes would normally be.

"Please tell me we'll be there soon." said an equally sea-sick Tea. Mai seemed to be the only giantess who didn't mind the rocking back and forth and up and down of the boat.

"Just hold it in for five more minutes. I can already see Duelist Kingdom on the horizon." Joey said, trying to comfort his little... well, big sister from atop her shoulder.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Sea-Sickness

choices: Mai gets her revenge on Kaiba
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Thankfully, the boat reached land before the girls felt too sick. Joey left out a sigh of relief as the girls went to land.

"Ah. That already feels better," remarked Tea.

"Well, I suppose everyone has their quirks," commented Mai from the snide. "Except me of course."

Soon afterwords, the rest of the group had made it topside and went to explore the island. Unfortunately for the girls (and to the secret delight of Joey, Kaiba, and Tristen), Pegasus couldn't find any sheets big enough for them, so they were stuck walking around naked. What lay in front of them were the ruins of Duelist Kingdom, with dilapidated dueling arenas, deceratory buildings falling apart, and an abundance of plant life. From the top of Tea's shoulder, Yugi could see the everything

"What happenend here?" he asked. "I mean, last time we were here this place was kept perfectly."

Pegasus cleared his throat as he walked through a bunch of old dueling arenas. "Well you see, since everyone thought I was dead, the taxmen decided to raid Duelist Kingdom and confiscate the eqipment and remove the staff in order to pay off some loans I owed. Only the main castle
itself is untouched."

Kaiba snickered. "Poetic justice."

Before Pegasus could respond to that, a large shadow descended upon the two, forcing them to run out of the way. Looking back, they saw Mai falling down rapidly, causing a small earthquake as she hit the ground!

"What the hell?!" began Kaiba.

"I tripped on one of the beat up arenas," Mai replied, half embarassed.

Tristan couldn't help but laugh. "Jeez Mai, you caused a pretty big earthquake."

"What are you implying?" angrily responded Mai.

Kaiba was much more blunt. "That you're a fatass." Needless to say, this didn't sit well with Mai, who didn't exactly like Kaiba much to begin with. The hand that reached to grab Kaiba was proof of that.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: The fallen kingdom.

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Pegasus saw what was going on. As much as he disliked Kaiba, and as much as he would benefit from the demise of his business rival, Pegasus was a gentleman at heart and couldn't stand to see Kaiba get smashed into a bloody pulp... cartoon violence was one thing, but this wouldn't sit well with him. He charged and tackled Kaiba to the ground so that Mai's hand just barely missed him.

"What the-" Kaiba began.

"Do yourself a favor Kaiba, let me handle this. You're just going to get yourself in more trouble." Pegasus stood up and dusted himself off. "You'll have to forgive Kaiba, I'm sure he's under a lot of stress. Anyone would be in Seto's shoes. Hosting a tournament, managing a multi billion dollar company, and to top it all off trying to help you three lovely ladies get back to normal." Pegasus said, his trademark charm kicking in.

"Well... ok." Mai said, reluctantly forgiving Kaiba at Pegasus's request. Not many people would defend Seto Kaiba, especially if he was his business rival... conclusion: Pegasus is a gentleman, Kaiba's a total ass hole.

"How does he do that?" Yugi asked, still sitting atop of Tea's shoulder.

"I have no idea Yugi," Tea said. "Let's just be glad that he can charm anyone he wants or Kaiba would've end up just like Marik..."

**************************************************

About an hour later, the girls were being examined by the Industrial Illusions doctors while Pegasus had the others join him in the dining hall for lunch. They hadn't eaten since breakfast of yesterday so they were all hungry. Kaiba was the only one who refused Pegasus's lunch invitation.

"Here, have a seat." Pegasus said, gesturing at nothing. Yugi and crew raised a brow but complied. "NO! Not there, there." He said still pointing at nothing. Yugi noticed some chairs near where they were all standing so he sat in them. "Yes, right there."

"What's with Pegasus Yug?" Joey whispered.

"Well... he's only got one eye so that means his depth perception must really bite." Tristen answered in a whisper before Yugi could.

Meanwhile... Yugi was a bit distracted. 'Yami... I still don't trust Pegasus.' He thought to his alter ego. 'What if this is just another one of his crazy schemes? You saw what he's done in the past... Yami? Are you listening?!'

'Huh?' was all Yami thought back, as he was watching the three girls from the window in the dining hall... no one but Yugi saw him of course, since Yami looks somewhat like a ghost even to Yugi.

'Pervert...' was all Yugi could think back.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Pegasus's Hospitality.

choices: Pegasus and the others coming to get him
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Yugi needed to consult Yami for advice, but as long as he was staring at giant naked Tea, that wasn't going to happen. "Um, may I be excused? I'm full."

"Full already Yugi-boy?"

"Yeah." Grabbing a roast beef sandwich from the platter in front of him, Yugi went to one of the guest rooms in the castle to confront his Yami side.

"Yami, can we trust Pegasus?"

"Huh?! Oh, I'm sorry. I wasn't paying attention."

"I know that. That's why I had to excuse myself from the table. Now can you answer the question?"

"Any trace of the millenium eye's power has dissapeared along with Pegasus' depth perception, if that's what you're worried about."

"The problem seems deeper than that," responded Yugi. "I mean, this was the same man that kidnapped my grandfather. After reading all those memoirs of his, I can't help but wonder if he still wants my Millenium Puzzle."

"Right now, it seems that we don't have much of a choice in trusting him. If he does try anything, we'll stop him."

Yugi sighed as he stood up. Pegasus hadn't tried anything since they got here. But by all rights, he should have been dead. Was he being paranoid? Did Pegasus have an ulterior motive besides making Kaiba looking stupid? He didn't know the answers to any of the questions.

Before he could continue his train of thought further, a lound noise came from the hallway. When he looked outside, he saw...
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Suspicion

choices: Yugi agrees to help Kaiba... maybe he's right.
Yugi doesn't think Pegasus is really up to anything serious.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Kaiba was pacing back and forth, thinking to himself. Then, he heard Yugi talking to no one and walked into the room.

"Are you talking to yourself Yugi? You defanitely win the prize for creepy..." Kaiba said. "So, you don't trust Pegasus either?"

"How could I? He kidnapped grandpa and trapped his soul in the shadow realm... same with you and your brother-where is Mokuba anyway?"

"He's with... CRAP!!" Kaiba shouted as he realized Mokuba was hanging out with the girls in the examination room.

"Huh?"

"Never mind. Yugi, neither of us trust Pegasus... I know he's after the God Cards." Kaiba began, going into his paranoid dilusional theories of the world out to get him and his stuff. "He's not doing this out of goodwill! He's going to try and get even with us for humiliating him!!"

"I think you mean get even with ME for humiliating him." Yugi said, he had now become Yami-Yugi.

"Whatever, the point is, if we team up... we can expose Pegasus for the fraud he is! We can show the world that Pegasus is plotting against us with every move he makes! He probably put stuff in your food!! How idiotic is it for you to have actually accepted his food which was probably poisoned!!"

"You are such a psycho Kaiba..." Yami-Yugi said with a sigh.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Paranoid Dilusional Psychopath

choices: The lab where the girls are
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Yugi sighed as he heard Kaiba rant about an endless amount of conspiracy theories. While he wasn't sure if Kaiba was paranoid or not, he knew that he probably would feel better if he could prove something.

"Alright Kaiba, I'll help you find out what Pegasus is up to."

"Good. I don't really need your help, but we might get this done faster if we do work together."

Yugi smacked his head. He didn't like Kaiba;s rationalle, or his ego, but at this point, he didn't have much of a choice.

After finishing his rant, Kaiba sat down and began thinking. "The only question now is where we could find some evidence to prove Pegasus is a fraud."

After a few minutes, he had found the answer.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: All the wrong reasons

choices: The girls help Yugi and aren't as mad when they deal with Kaiba
Kaiba has to go round two since the girls are pissed.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
"Where are we going to look for signs that Pegasus is up to no good, Kaiba?" Yami-Yugi asked.

"The lab of course."

"Ah, keeping Serenity in your view I see."

"SHUT UP YUGI! And stop it with that damn tough guy voice... jesus... who do you think you are, Clint Eastwood?" Kaiba shouted. Yami-Yugi just grinned.

**************************************************

Meanwhile, in the lab, Mokuba was hanging out with Mai, Tea and Serenity. They became good friends during the period of time when Yugi, Kaiba, Tristen, and Joey were passed out.

Currently, the girls were sitting in a triangle like pattern. Tea was sitting on her knees, while Serenity sat indian style. Mai was just lying down with her knees up and her arms folded over her chest.

"Don't worry, I'm sure you three will be back to your old selves in no time." Mokuba said, standing in the palm of Tea's hand. They had tried letting him talk from the floor, but he was hurting his neck looking straight up to see their faces so when he asked, they decided to let him talk from the palm of whoever he was talking too.

"I sure hope so..." she said grimmly.

"It has to work Tea!" Serenity said. "This story would do horrible in the ratings unless everything turned out back to normal by the end of it."

"Anyway," Mokuba continued, as he didn't want the girls to anger the narrators of the story, "I just wanted to apologize for my brother." Mokuba said, as he walked from the palm of Tea's hand into Mai's. "He's under alot of stress right now, it's not his fault. He's really a nice guy... really, he is."

"Relax Mokuba." Mai said with a smile.

"Yeah," Serenity added, "We know what you mean."

Meanwhile, at about this time, Yami-Yugi and Kaiba were climbing through a window into the rafters. When Kaiba saw the scene below, he was not pleased.

'Yugi, you're on your own!' was all Yami thought before he ditched Yugi in a new-york-minute and re-appeared in his ghost form right in the center of the triangle the girls formed. He then began staring at Tea up and down.

"Wha--AH!" Yugi immediately panicked and grabbed onto the rafters with all his strength for fear of falling.

"Hey, what's it like being so huge?" Mokuba asked.

"Huh?" asked Mai.

"You know, is it... wierd to be able to hold people in the palm of your hand and stuff?"

"A bit," said Mai. "but it has it's advantages."

"Like?"

To demonstrate their point, the girls began demonstrating the advantages, still not leaving the positions they were in. They held Mokuba, lifted him and passed him around. Mokuba was having the time of his life, this was so cool! Then, as Serenity grabbed him, she accidently grabbed Mokuba by the sides of his stomach, and caused him to laugh.

"Stop it! That tickles!!" Mokuba shouted, laughing the whole time.

"Oh, it does... does it?" Serenity asked, thinking this was just about the cutest thing ever. "Well, how about this?" she then proceeded to intentionally tickle Mokuba. The girls thought it was cute too, so they soon joined in one at a time.

Kaiba was watching from the rafters, each thing going on down there building like hot magma in the bowels of an active volcanoe. He was already so mad that he could not hear any of Yugi's crys for help. Finally, when his little brother was being passed around like a toy, and being tickled without mercy... he went into super brother mode.

"THAT'S ENOUGH!" Kaiba shouted as he jumped down and landed on a large computer-type machine. He then jumped down into the center of the triangle the girls formed.

"Put my brother down! Quit passing him back and forth like some god-damned toy!!" Kaiba ordered. Tea, who was currently holding Mokuba, complied and placed him by his older brother.

"But, Kaiba-" Tea began.

"YOU'RE GOING TO TRAUMATIZE HIM!! HE'S NINE YEARS OLD, HE DOESN'T NEED TO BE HELD IN THE PALM OF ANY-ONES HAND!!! HE'S NINE AND ALREADY, THANKS TO YOU THREE, HE'S SEEN EVERY PART OF THE FEMALE BODY!! HE DOESN'T NEED THAT!!" Kaiba shouted, sounding more like a concerned parent than a brother.

As much as he was guilting them, he eventually just started shouting and insulting them. Finally, the girls were more angry at Kaiba than ashamed of themselves and getting ready to have Kaiba go on for round two as a human dildo... but first:

"Mokuba," Serenity began. "The three of us are kind of hungry, could you go tell the cooks to get us as much food as possible and lead them back over here?"

"Sure thing." Mokuba shouted in return, as Kaiba's ranting was really loud. Mokuba left, meaning it was just the girls and Kaiba. Yami sat back thinking, 'This should be interesting.'

"HELP!!" Yugi shouted from the rafters, interrupting everything.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: To the lab!

The girls attempt to grab Kaiba was quickly interrupted by the sight of Yugi dangling from the rafters. Quickly standing up, Tea extended her hands.

"Jump Yugi!"

Yugi looked down at the space between Tea's hands and himself. It was at least 50 feet down.

"You're crazy! I'm not jumping that!"

"Trust me!"

Nodding, Yugi held his breath and let go of the rafters, landing square in Tea's hands, unharmed. He breathed a sigh of relief as he looked up at Tea's gigantic face.

"Are you OK?" she asked.

"Fine. But I'd rather not have to do that again."

Tea smiled as she put Yugi down on the floor. All three girls now turned their attention to Kaiba, who was ranting the entire time.

"Does he ever shut up?" asked Mai half annoyed as she grabbed him.

Kaiba stood firm as he responded. "I don't want my little brother becoming a pervert!"

"Pervert?" responded Mai half confused, half annoyed. "We invited Mokuba in because he's the only one that's NOT a pervert!"

Kaiba looked dumbfounded as Mai passed him to Serenity. "I know you two have some unfinished buisness. He's all yours, Serenity."

Moving his head quickly so no one could see him blush, Kaiba tried to free himself from Serenity's grip to no avail.

"So," Serenity began.

"So what? What do you want to know? Why I'm a protective brother? Why I don't trust you? Why does everyone think I blush whenever I see you?"

"How did it feel being used as a dildo?"

Everyone looked at Serenity and Kaiba dumbfounded at that question. After two minutes, Kaiba began to respond, not so much looking at Serenity as he was her breasts.

"Are you serious?!"

"Very serious."

"How did I feel?"

"Yes."

"Well, uh, you see, I'm not really sure what you mean. Define 'feel'."

"When I used you as a dildo, did you like it?"

Yugi sweatdropped while the girls giggled. No wonder they sent Mokuba on an errand!

"You mean..."

Serenity giggled as she asked again. "You remember. I picked you up and used you because you were being a jerk. Did you like it? And why aren't you looking at my face?"

Kaiba groaned from the sheer embarassment of the situation. Finally, he answered, his head not moving.

"Well, uh, maybe just..."

"You did like it?"

"I DIDN'T SAY THAT!" angrily shouted Kaiba, his face turning redder and redder.

"But you were about to," interrupted Tea.

"We can see it Kaiba," added Mai. "You like her. Now be a good boy and admit it."

As entertaining as this all was for Yugi, the greater problem of finding evidence against Pegasus lingered. He needed to get Kaiba down.

"Uh, Serenity, can you put Kaiba down? We need to do something important."

Serenity smiled at Yugi as she put Kaiba down. "Sure." Yugi breathed a sigh of relief as Kaiba stared.

"Why did she listen to you?"

"Maybe you should try being a little nicer Kaiba. A little courtesty goes a long way."

Kaiba didn't respond.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Embarassing questions

choices: Yugi so he could talk to them.
Joey and Tristen cause they're be perverts.

And so, a fuming Kaiba lead Yugi to the computers in the lab. Kaiba began running searches and hacking on one of the main computers, Yugi did the same on another one, and Yami just kept staring at the giant naked Tea.

"Find anything yet, Kaiba?" Yugi asked.

**************************************************

Kaiba was thinking. He did NOT like the idea of 3 200 foot tall giantesses who all disliked him. So, after about 2 seconds of debating with himself, he finally stepped forward.

"Pegasus, alone the two of have failed in trying to find a cure. But, together, I think we can do this. Both of us could combine our resources and technological findings, together, we'd have to come up with something."

Meanwhile, the girls were still in the examination room when the doors opened up and in walked...

Tea responded by picking him up in her hand. "I guess, but it's nice to have power."

Yugi sweatdropped while the other girls giggled at his predicament. But unknown to them, someone was watching the scene from the rafters above.

The events came flooding back to Mai, as she remembered acting uncharactersitcly nice to Joey. But what really surprised her was that she remembered liking what she did.

"I...I do," muttered Mai. "But, this is all wrong! Joey's a jerk! What did he do?"

Serenity stared on, confused. "Come again?"

Mai's face turned red as she continued to panic. "I know it wasn't MY idea! I mean, he's a jerk, right? But, it did feel, oh, this is so wrong!"

Tea looked on practically dumbfounded as Mai continued to freak out. Not knowing the true nature of the problem, or what Mai was ranting about except for the fact that it involved Joey, she offered one suggestion.

***************
.PEGASUS'S LAB.

Pegasus groaned as he saw the negative results. The chemicals were refusing to form a coavalent bond. After all, sodium wouldn't exactly bond with radium all that well. In fact, assuming it DID bond with radium, the compound would be very unstable and very explosive.

Sodium has a very... "Healthy" reaction with most other elements. (meaning it explodes) Radium, however, has it's outer ring of electrons full, as do all other elements in this row of the periodic table. This means it will not bond willingly with other elements. In order to bond it with anything, an electron would have to be removed without changing the physical structure of the element.

This was impossible, but it may very well be the only way to complete an antidote. Sodium Radide, an element unheard of and unconcieved, that is... until Pegasus discovered the possabilities of this combination.

"Alright, this is attempt number 648 to covalently bond radium and sodium. Let's see how this goes." Pegasus said into the recorder.

He looked on his computer. He removed an electron from the electron cloud. the radium began shaking, the structure faltering. It was now that the sodium would have to be bonded, in these crutial few seconds. He did so. The compound glowed and gave off immense light and heat. It was beautiful, until it exploded...

"No... I will not fail!" Pegasus shouted, slamming his fists down on the table.

But, you have to agree that you won't send any more deranged politicians after me. And... if it's not all that much trouble, please get rid of Bob Dole. I mean... look at him!"

Mokuba had ran off to play with Serenity, Tristen was mumbling something about an old man, Mai and Joey were enjoying their noontime brunch (considering that they only got back to the castle 15 minutes ago, Pegasus' chefs did an incredible job of making enough food quickly) and everyone else was working on the supposed antidote. Seeing as she had nothing better to do, Tea decided to pay Yugi a visit.

Of course, when she made it to Yugi's room, he wasn't there. Just some old man with a wig, rubbing his head like it was hit with a heavy object. Attempting to be as polite as possible, she slowly approached the man and softly spoke to him.

"Excuse me?"

"Are you OK?" she asked.

"J...just fine. I'm fine."

Deep within Yugi's brain, the voice of Yami began to egg him on. "Nice going idiot. Now she thinks you're crazy."

"Only because of you!" harsly replied Yugi.

"Well, she is here, aren't you gonna ask her out?"

"WHAT?! Are you crazy?"

Turning his attention to Tea, he tried to start up a conversation. "What brings you here?"

"I'm bored," replied Tea. "Everyone's off doing their own little thing, and you've been really quiet this whole trip. I wanted to make sure you were alright."

YES!

Once again, Yugi was forced to deal with his Yami, which sounded overly excited. What are you so happy about?

"She's bored AND worried about you! From women, that's almost a sure sign that they want sex.

"You're depraved!"

"Look Yugi, I'm 4000 years old. I know this stuff."

"For the last time, Tea sees me as a friend. Nothing more, nothing less."

"Bull! And I'll prove it!"

"Y..you were? That's sweet."

"See! Now I'm gonna ask her to go somewhere private!

Yami attempted to speak again, but at the last second, Yugi covered his mouth and attempted to get Yami to calm down. Tea, who was completely oblivious to Yugi's internal struggle, watched Yugi with no idea what to do.

"I was wondering," she began as she slowly wrapped her hand around Yugi, "if you're scared of me."

"Scared? Because of a couple extra hundred feet? Nah."

"You sure?"

Tea shook her head. "You're right. But I have been thinking about you."

"Oh? What exactly have you been thinking about?"

Tea struggled to find the grip on the words she wanted to say. It was kind of funny actually. Despite her newfound massive physical power, mentally, she still felt weak and unable to put it together.

Come on Tea. Get it together. You can do this. It isn't too hard.

==========Twenty Minutes Later...================

"I found something!" Pegesus yelled.

"Is it another pop-up?"

"No, even better!"

"What?" Kabia asked, looking up. Pegesus was holding a can of Pringles.

"I found some Sour Cream & Onion Pringles TM!"

============Forty Minutes Later...===============

"Shut up!" Kabia yelled.

"What?"

"Okay."

"Darn it! I thought the special electrons in this mix would help the shrinking properties of the other mix!" Pegesus said, groaning.

"BOB DOLE WANTS PRINGLES!"

The scream was so loud that Kabia dropped a bit of the formula he was holding. It got on the plant, and the plant instantly shrunk.

Kabia and Pegesus looked at each other. Then they looked at the door. Bob Dole had...helped?

Freak Boy stepped forward, wearing a long red pea-coat/trench coat with a pair of sunglasses. His pants were red and his shoes were red and shined to perfection. He had really bad hair, John Kerry style but dark brown.

"You cannot kill the threat of Communism. Besides, you destroyed a mock-image of myself. The "Freakyboy" you killed was not me, but rather a likeness of me created by your imaginations and illegaly typed. Yes, illegally. You were using my likeness without my permition, therefore my good sirs, you are in violation of copyright law, section 4, sub-section 76. You are also in breach of this law using the technique which I pioneered along with Somedude, aka random elements in a giantess fan fiction. This means you are quite within the realms of legal action under the guise of a lawsuit." Freak Boy said, holding up the book of copyright law.

"Besides," he continued. "I am nothing like what you made me seem. I'm not always into random violence, the only reason I promote violence is to further promote a Trotskyite revolution to overthrow the Imperialist Capitalist regime of America, now turned Fascist by the opressive Bush Administration, and furthermore - "

"Man, this guy really likes to hear himself talk..." Drez whispered to Wizard.

"Will he shut up?"

"Don't know." Ken said.

"And what's with the red? He gay or something?" Joey asked. Mai gave Joey a slight fwap on the head for that.

"No, Red is the color of Communism, that's why I wear it. I am not a pure Communist, but a Trotskyite. Now then, allow me to show you WHY I am here..." Freak Boy said. As he spoke, the flag of the Soviet Union flew behind him.

"Damn, how unpatriotic can you get?" Kaiba commented to Serenity.

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
At this point, most of the 4th Internationale had dissipated from the main area. Freak Boy, however, was still there.

"Ok, didn't we learn about the reprocussions of merging dimensions from my last three stories? Dr. Doom is gonna kill me if this dimension starts merging..." Freak Boy said nervously, running a hand through his hair.

======IN LATVERIA======

"The foolish author still has not learned. You can only vex Doom so many times before he is forced to take drastic measures, Freak Boy. If you do not manage to ceace this, then I swear I shall reign fury and doom upon your mortal soul!" Dr. Doom shouted, throwing his wine goblet at the computer screen.

"Uhm, Lord Doom... He can't hear you... you know that, right?"

======BACK ON DUELIST KINGDOM======

"Ok, you know what? Crossing dimensions is bad for a number of reasons - SERIOUSLY!! Enough! DBZ was once a good show, but it was ruined when the writers got too cocky and messed everything up with the different levels of Super Saiyan. It was once 'Super Saiyan! AH! The most unachievable level of Saiyan power! Oh god! Everybody run!' THEN EVERYONE COULD BE SUPER SAIYAN AND IT WAS ALL 'Oh god! He's gone Giant Monkey Super Saiyan 34 Turbo XLR Magnum!!'

"Let this formerly amusing anime show remain in it's place without invading the sanctity of our semi-organized story before we get into more copyright infrengements. Now then--" Freak Boy pulled out a laptop and began typing. A portal to the DBZ world opened up. "All those who wish to return to your own dimensions, do so or face the wrath of Stalinist Gulags."

Most of the DBZ characters were more than willing to go into their own dimension and duke it out, especially after seeing what happened with that really wierd story with Neo, Trinity, Dr. Doom, the Authors and those video game GTS. However, one refused to leae...

"I am Vegeta! Prince of the Saiyans!"

"Hey, if your father is dead, then wouldn't that make you king? Like... even before you met Goku, you would be King, because your father was dead, but even then you referred to yourself as king." Freak Boy asked, quirking a brow.

"Ah, the whole series is flawed." Joey said.

"Like Star Wars, with Princess Leia, when General Tarken blew up her planet she'd be queen at that point." Drez said.

"Well, her mother was already dead, so wouldn't she be queen already?" Joey asked, scratching the back of his head.

"And what's with the lightsabers? You turn them on and it goes yeigh high-" Freak Boy said, leaving about 3 feet between his hands. "How the hell's it know when to stop?"

"Uhm... the force?" Ken asked.

"Ok, enough of the nerd fest." Mai said. She grabbed Vegeta and shoved him into the wormhole. "Too many characters in one story means we get left out of it, so let's hurry up and end this thing."

"I couldn't agree more, Mai." Freak Boy said, closing the portal. "Now then... the 4th Internationale will strike North America first, as revolution and Socialism is needed there more than anywhere else. Good luck getting there."

And with that, Freak Boy and the leaders of the 4th Internationale dissapeared.

"Great, what do we do now?" Serenity asked Kaiba, who was sitting on her shoulder.

"I guess we have no choice... we need to get to North America and stop the 4th Internationale."

"Wait... if the 4th Internationale wins, then Mai, Tea and Serenity go back to normal, so wouldn't that mean--"

Yugi's argument was met with glares by Tea, Serenity and Mai, making him shut up immediatly.

"We're going to North America." Mai stated firmly, picking up Joey and Drez. Tea got Yugi and Wizard, Serenity got Ken and Kaiba.

"What about me?" Tristen asked.

"Nobody likes you, go hang out with Bob Dole."

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Kaiba shrugged. "Screw it. We're in a place we don't, chasing a communist nutjob. I say we wait a day, and deal with it in the morning."

"Sounds good to me," replied Drez. With no hotel in sight, the group set up a camp with the various giantesses standing guard.

****************************************************

Not too far away, a small Cessna propeller airplane was flying between parts of upstate New York, delivering mail to farms and other such regions that were out of the way of the big cities. That was before the call came in though. Pressing a button on the plane console, a voice came through.

"Hello, Somedude Mail Courier, how may I help you?"

"Somedude. It's me."

"Dr. Nanbu! What's going on? Is it an emergency?"

"You'd better believe it. It's Freak Boy. He's leading a communist revolution in Ohio."

"So? Freak Boy pulls a stunt like this every now and then, then gets distracted and goes home. Big deal."

"We've picked up forces leaving Lavertia as well, under the command of Dr. Doom himself."

"The Doomship?"

Thinking back, Somedude remembered the last time Doom and Freak Boy met. A bizzare crossover of anime and videogame giantesses along with authors had threatened the very fabric of time and space, along with the sanity of everyone involved in the incident. With the combined force of the God Phoenix and Doomship, the giantesses were returned to their own dimensions, albeit with a warning from Doom. If Freak Boy pulled a stunt...

"There's something missing. Does it involve unusually large women?"

"How did you know?"

"The universe itself is at risk."

"So I assumed. Somedude, this insanity has to stop. You are to meet up with the rest of the Science Ninja Team aboard the God Phoenix and meet up with Freak Boy before Doom or those giantesses do."

"I understand." Turning the plane off the course he was taking, Somedude hit the throttle. When he was safely away from anyone who could see him, he revealed the bracelet that was on his wrist, and placed it in front of his forehead.

"BIRD GO!"

What followed was a series of flashy lights and sound effects surrounding the plane that wouldn't be out of place in an anime series. When the lights faded, the single engine propeller plane had turned into a futuristic looking jet aircraft. Somedude, dressed in a delivery boy outfit, was wearing a distinct birdlike outfit, complete with cape, helmet, and suit.

"Authors. They never learn," thought Somedude as he pushed the plane towards its destination.

"This is G-1. You guys..."

"We heard," replied a voice on the radio. "This is..."

"I know. Just get ready to pull me in."
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: The last line of defense against author insanity

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
======Ohio======

"Look, I know we want to avoid a loss of human life, but if they stand in the way of Progressive Mankind-"

"No, Comrade Freak Boy!" Trotsky said, interrupting Freak Boy. "Listen, to stand in the way of Progressive Mankind is a crime. But it is impossible to distinguish between fellow Socialists simply trying to defend their homes, Right-Wing Nut Jobs who fear losing their money, or innocent civillians with no political background at all!"

"Comrade Trotsky, you're a good man, but I'm afraid your leadership has suffered with old age." Lenin said, looking over maps of the state of Ohio. "When I put you in command of the Red Army, you were more than willing to kill the rebellious uprising in 1918."

"That was a Civil War! This is different!"

"How is it different, Comrade Trotsky?" Freak Boy asked, pulling out a soda. "Face it... this is just like the October Revolution. We have the leaders, we have the Marxists... all we need now is cooperation amongst the upper ranks. Remember, that's one of the reasons Capitalism will fail--nobody has the good of the people in mind, only their own cause in mind. If leaders truly thought of the people, there would not be inner power struggles.

"I know you're anxious, we all are... but this is for the good of the world."

Trotsky paused and thought for a moment. Finally, he nodded. "You're right, Comrade Freak Boy."

"Sorry, Comrades Lenin, Freak Boy and Trotsky, but I still think that revolution is not necessary. If we do this democratically,"

"Oh shut up, Yeltsin." Freak Boy said. "I don't even know why you're here! You're a traitor to Communists and Socialists everwhere! If not for you, the Soviet Union would still be in tact and Cuba, China and Vietnam wouldn't be turning Capitalist and North Korea wouldn't have switched to pure dictatorship!"

"Calm down, Comrade Freak Boy." Gorbachev said. "It was partly my fault too."

"Look, can we get on with this? I mean - The army is waiting for their orders and we should really get to doing this." Freak Boy said, kneading his forhead. "We have to stop this Fascist America from turning into the next Nazi Party. Wouldn't you agree, Comrades?"

The leaders of the 4th Internationale nodded and stood up. Unlike most military systems, Freak Boy had made sure all leaders were equal in status and position, as well as all soldiers were the same. Communism doesn't do well with ranks.

The 4th Internationale charged into battle, Freak Boy at the front in a tank.

"Don't kill unless they're armed!" Freak Boy ordered. "If you are met with resistance, show no mercy."

They went into battle, Lenin leading the artillery strikes, Trotsky commanding the footsoldiers, Freak Boy leading the tank squad, Gorbachev commanding the airforce, and Yeltsin marching around like an idiot...

"OH GOD! We're fucked!" shouted Drew Cary, turning the corner and running from the Communist Army.

======Meanwhile...======

Yugi, Joey and Ken were asleep, leaving the others awake to hear the sounds of bombs, bullets and airplanes in the distance, accompanied by Russian and Spanish shouting.

"Should we check it out, or just lay low?" Tea asked.

Will the girls manage to beat the 4th Internationale? Is Somedude out to help Freak Boy's army, or stop the revolution? YOU DECIDE BECAUSE I DON'T KNOW!!

(AN: The 4th Internationale is a rebel organization started by Leon Trotsky in the late 1930's. After his assination in 1940, the movement didn't die, and there are still people like myself who are loyal to the 4th Internationale. Members of the 4th Internationale are mainly Trotskyites, but sometimes are referred to as Marxist-Leninists, Radical Socialists, Revolutionary Socialists and Communists.)

"No. I have to convince Freak Boy that what he's doing is going to doom the universe...again. You, Jun, and Jinpei standby in case I need help. Ryu, you make sure the radar notifies us in case the Doomship or giantesses enter the area."

"Like you really need help, Golden Boy."

"Hey, I make mistakes," replied Somedude as he approached the exit. "I write GTS fanfiction, remember?"

****************************************************

Freak Boy and the rest of the communist forces were leading the charge against Ohio, which is pretty much a nice way of saying they were causing total panic.

"March soldiers of the great revolution!" shouted Freak Boy. "March GAH!"

From behind him, a man in a white and blue bird uniform snuck up from behind Freak Boy and put him in a choke hold. Wasting no time, Freak Boy threw the man off of him, as he landed and got into a combat stance.

"Somedude? You oppose the revolution?"

"I'm here to give you a warning Freak Boy."

"What kind of warning?"

"Dr. Doom's left Latvertia and he's pissed off. At you. He's heading to Ohio as we speak."

Freak Boy's face turned pale. "Doom?"

"YES! And on top of the giantesses from another dimension showing off, we're in a whole load of shit."

"The communist..."

"Freak Boy, remember what happened the last time authors entered a story like this?"

Freak boy shook his head sheepishly.

"Giantesses from of different dimensions growing out of control. Dr. Doom and the Science Ninja Team Gatchaman teamed with Neo and Trinity to take it out in probably THE oddest crossover ever."

"OH! I remember that. Say, I never did get Doom's autograph that one..."

"Dammit, we're all dead if they show up here!"

Before Freak Boy could make a decision, however, someone had arrived.

As if on que with Freak Boy opening his mouth, there was a thudding noise. It began raining and the thudding noise came again.

"What the-" Somedude began before Freak Boy held a finger to silence him. Freak Boy pointed to a T-Rex footpring in the ground.

The thud came again and the water rippled.

"Steven Spielburg is gonna sue your ass, you know that, right?" Somedude asked.

"Shut up!" Freak Boy said, silencing him again. The thud came again then, over the trees, came the figure of Mai.

"Oh hell--we've gotta get this cleaned up before Doom shows up or he'll kill me! Comrade Gorbachev! Focus all air fire power on the Giantesses, Comrade Lenin, get the artillery on them ASAP!" Freak Boy shouted.

"Right!" they said in unison.

"Somedude, I never ask you for anything--"

"You ask me for everything, you freakin' mooch." Somedude said, interrupting Freak Boy.

"Shut up and let me finish. I never ask you for anything, and I'm always there for you--"

"You're never there for me. When I asked you to have my back when I was gonna break up with that chick, you took off and ran leaving me to rot."

"Ok, you know what? Fuck you! Just help me out or I'm putting these on the net!" Freak Boy said, handing Somedude a manilla folder. Somedude opened it, pulled out the photos and went pale.

"You wouldn't!"

"I would."

"You can't!"

"I can."

"You won't!"

"I will..."

Somedude paused for a moment.

"Fine, I'll help you get rid of the giantesses, get the authors back into reality and then we're back to our own dimension. And... these guys are going back where they belong." Somedude said, gesturing to the dead Soviet leaders. Freak Boy sighed.

"Man, why are you always the logical one?"

"Because I have a life and don't dedicate my existance to a Socialist Revolution." Somedude said with a smirk.

"Oh yeah?! Well--OH SHIT!!" Freak Boy shouted, jumping and tackling Somedude out of the way of Mai's foot. "Damn, that was close! Comrade Trotsky, get your men out of here! There's nothing more they can do! We have Clevland, and that's a start, but if all our soldiers die we'll lose this war!"

"Right, Comrade Freak Boy. All units, fall back!" Trotsky ordered.

"You're not making us go back to normal! We're staying like this!" Tea growled, stomping towards Freak Boy and Somedude.

"Somedude, release the trap!" Freak Boy shouted.

"Trap? What trap? I don't have a trap!"

"You were supposed to have a trap!"

"We haven't even spoken since you hooked up with these wackos, how the hell was I supposed to know to bring a--JESUS!!" Somedude grabbed Freak Boy and activated his jetpack, zooming off into the air just in time to dodge death itself.
