1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Somedude let go of Freak Boy and sighed.

"Sorry, just been stressful lately. This is, what... the third time you've threatened the balance of the universe?"

"Fourth if you count the website." Freak Boy said, putting a finger to his chin.

"Enough! Let's end this!" Ken shouted.

Freak Boy took a fighting stance.

"Activate Freak Boy Armor!" he shouted, initiating a flash of light and transforming into a cool suit of armor. It resembled the Happy Noodle Armor from JCV's Comics, but instead of smiley faces there were hammer and sickles.

Freak Boy and Somedude walked onto the hull of the God Pheonix.

"So, Somedude... any sins you want to confess before we risk our lives?"

"This from the atheist?"

"I just want dirt on you so that I can spread it all around when we get out of this." Freak Boy said with a smirk beneath the armor. Somedude just sighed.

======Aboard the Doomship======

Doom looked at this newcomer. A saiyan. He smirked. Doom has faced Gods and come back alive, he can certainly handle a monkey--albeit a lazer shooting monkey.

Doom thought back to all those he has bent to his will... the Skrulls, Lyja Lazerfist, the Atlanteans, Namor the Submariner--he had even conquered an alien beast of pure energy!(see FF 381) A Saiyan would be no match for the intelligence and technological skill of Victor Von Doom. He projected a holographic image of himself outside for all to see.

======Outside======

"Attention authors! You are to depart to your own dimensions, or face the wrath of Dr. Doom! I am being merciful, do as you are told and you shall live to write again!" Doom shouted.

"Oh boy, he's pissed... wait-he said he'd let us go! Fuck this dimension, let's go!" Freak Boy said as he began running, but Somedude quickly grabbed him.

"The very fabric of space and time is at stake, if we don't stop this from progressing then it'll spread to our dimension too." Somedude said.

"Wait--the fabric of space and time?" questioned Serenity, stepping forward and standing at eye level with the God Pheonix.

"Yes, this has happened before... two times before if I'm right. Both times the universe was almost destroyed because of the merging of dimensions. Right, Freak Boy? ...... Freak Boy?" Somedude asked, turning to his partner. Freak Boy was wide eyed, he whispered to Somedude.

"I think I remember why I stopped being ascetic and contributed to the destruction of space and time last time..." he said, gesturing to Serenity. Somedude took this time to smack his partner as hard as he could. Freak Boy fell down. "Thanks... I needed that."

Ken flew next to Serenity.

"What's going on?" he demanded.

"Hold on, Ken." Mai said, stepping up as well. "Ok, now what about space and time?"

Freak Boy and Somedude proceeded to tell their sad story. But, what will happen? Do the giantesses believe them, will they risk it? Or do they think it's like the third movement from Epsom, by salts? (in other words, a bunch of bullshit.)

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
And so, Somedude and Freak Boy began to tell a story about contradicting plot points, lonely authors with odd fetishies writing at the wee hours of the morning, and Dr. Doom's inherit anger at all of them. During all of it, a furious Mai and Ken looked on at the two of them as if they had twenty heads.

"So?"

"That is the biggest load of bullshit I've ever heard in my life!" shouted Mai. "Just who in the hell are you?!"

Somedude sighed along with Freak Boy. "Time for Plan B."

"What's Plan B?"

The question was answered by a bright flash coming from a flare in the sky. Doom and the others looked on as they attempted to see what was there.

"Who are you?!" shouted an infuriated Doom.

"Sometimes we are five," began Ryu.

"Sometimes, we are one," continued Joe.

"We are the guardians of dimensions, sworn to act when authors take their stories to untold levels of idiocy," added Jun.

"The protectors of peace and justice that are dedicated towards more than going inside a giant girl's panties!" added Jinpei, as a white shadow descended on the black night sky.

"The white shadow that moves unseen. The Kagaku Ninjatai- GATCHAMAN!"

Silence and awe fell over the area as Freak Boy looked on at his partner.

"And you say I'm overdramatic," interrupted Freak Boy.

"It works."

Ken looked on at the God Phoenix in fury, his Sayain blood in full rage mode. "KILL THEM!"

"Now what?" asked Freak Boy.

"This is the fun part. We subdue the giantesses. I'm going to go board the Doomship and negotiate with the Doctor over you. And you're coming with me."

"WHAT?!"

"Trust me. Joe, you're in charge."

"Bullshit. You just wanted to sound dramatic."

They yelled at Tea and Serenity to pick them up and they agreed picked up the two authors and drez yelled "WAIT DON'T ATTACK HIM BY GANGING UP HE'LL DESTROY THE PLANET!!!" the leader only heard the destroy the planet part "Good God! We can't let that happen!" "Sir he said if we attack him he'll destroy the planet" Said Ryu, The leader...

Watch the God Phoenix fix things up outside.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
The God Phoenix wasn't sure what to do. Doom, on the other hand, was not afraid.

======Onboard the Doomship======

"Doomsman!" he barked at the pilot. "Concentrate this ship's firepower on Kentenko... we shall teach him the meaning of humility. He shall never forget that I AM DOOM!!" he shouted, clenching a fist.

"Targeting the Saiyan, Lord Doom." said the Doomsman. He typed at his consol for a moment or two then the ship began to glow.

======Outside======

Kentenko saw the glow and immediatly began flying towards the Doomship. Unfortunately, blind rage isn't a good thing. The Doomship fired it's primary weapon, knocking Kentenko back and out of sight. He'd be back, of that there was no doubt, but the Doomship never intended to destroy him....

======Onboard the Doomship======

"Target is still alive, Lord Doom. He's heading towards our position at 700mph." said a Doomsman.

"Of course he is. It was never my intention to kill him, or he'd be dead. You underestimate Doom?"

"No! Of course not, Lord Doom!"

"Good, for it is my plan to make him so angry that he will be blinded by rage. When you are angry, you make mistakes... His Ki will be enough to power my armies for a millenium! If he attacks the Doomship, I will harness all of his energy! Doom shall be unstoppable!"

"Brilliant, Lord Doom!"

"Of course it is! You should know that Doom does nothing in haste, every one of my actions are carefully planned and calculated so as to benefit my ultimate goal of world domination." he said, standing and going to the observation deck. "Soon... all too soon, global domination will be mine!"

======Outside======

Ken rushed towards the ship, a ki ball charging in his hand as his golden Saiyan hair lengthened. He reached level 3.

"HYAAH!!" Ken shouted, sending his energy to the Doomship. The Doomship began to glow as the blast hit it, absorbing his energy. Ken screamed as he couldn't shut off his ki blast. The energy was being sucked from him forcfully. (Doom did this before, but I can't remember in what issue...)

After about 5 minutes of constant energy being ripped from Ken, it stopped. He was drained and down to normal Saiyan level. He collapsed to his knees, Doom's laughter penetrating the hull of the Doomship.

======Onboard the Doomship======

"And so, we see that no mere monkey is a match for the superior intelligence of Doom." he said, turning his chair to face the power core of the Doomship, now glowing with energy. Doom took so much energy, the Doomsmen had to keep taking it from the core and storing it in Energy Packs.

"Do not disturb me. I shall be in my quarters." Doom said, standing and marching off to his privat living quarters.

Meanwhile... Freak Boy and Somedude were sneaking around the Doomship.

"Somedude, the Freak Boy Armor just ran the calculations, and the two of us combined are no match for Doom." Freak Boy said nervously.

"Relax, I've got a plan." Somedude said.

"I just hope it's good enough to work against Doom." Freak Boy said.

The two began sneaking across the Doomship, knocking out a Doomsman or two and hiding them as they moved along. Finally, they reached Doom's private quarters.

"On the count of three..." Freak Boy said. "One..."

"Two..."

The two burst into the room on "Three", only to find Doom already waiting, gun in hand. Freak Boy ducked just in time to avoid the bullet from it.

"Stop!" Somedude said.

"You dare invade the sanctity of the Doomship, and order Doom?!"

"It will be worth your while, Lord Doom." Somedude said, bowing.

"... Very well. You have Doom's attention."

"I would like to propose a truce. I am willing to negotiate the following terms; you leave US Airspace and we give you Freak Boy." Somedude said, grabbing his partner by the shoulder and pushing him forward.

"YOU JUDAS!!" Freak Boy shouted, ready to strangle him.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Doom's World Domination Scheme

choices: Exactly what is Dr. Doom going to do with Freak Boy?
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Outside, with the Doomship still in the sky and Ken left broken and beaten on the ground, the God Phoenix focused its attention on the remaining problem, the giantesses.

"I just got the confirmation. Somedude and Freak Boy made it inside the Doomship," began Jun.

"Now," grinned Joe sadistically, "it's time for me to have some fun." Reaching for a joystick, Joe began moving the cursor on the screen towards the giantesses.

Mai, Tea, and Serenity weren't about to take being blown to pieces sitting down though. They quickly resorted to throwing whatever they could find at the God Phoenix, including Drez and Wizard.

"Incoming authors!"

"I see them Jinpei!" shouted Ryu. Quickly moving the jet, Ryu dodged the debries and authors. "Joe, if you're gonna take a shot, do it soon!"

Joe nodded. "OK." Pressing the button on the joystic, a single Bird Missile was fired at the giantesses. The resulting explosion knocked the three girls to the floor.

"All right!" shouted Jinpei. "That was too easy! And to think, Somedude's having all the fun on the Doomship..."

On the ground, Yugi, Joey, Tristen, and Kaiba all stood next to where the girls were felled by the Bird Missle.

"Uh," began Joey, "anyone got a plan?"

Tristen just stood there furious. "Alright you ninja freaks! I'm sick of being made fun of by everyone! Come down here and I'll kick all your asses!"

**************************************************

"Is he kidding?" asked Jun. Joe, Jinpei, and Ryu were already heading for the elevator to the hull.

"I'd rather not waste Bird Missles that we might need against the Doomship. Besides, it might be fun." Reluctantly, Jun followed.

**************************************************

Yugi and Joey both looked on at the angry Tristen, who was also joined by Kaiba. "Tristen," began Yugi, "are you sure this is a good idea, pissing off a bunch of ninjas?"

"Please. How bad can they GAH!"

Tristen was quickly interrupted by a hail of feather shaped shurikens as they hit various parts of his body, sending him to the floor. Soon afterwards, the four Science Ninjas landed on the ground.

"So," began Jun. "You boys really want to fight us?"

Kaiba smirked. "Please. I'm not afraid of a bunch of Power Rangers!"

The utterance of the word "Power Rangers" caused silence in the area. Standing up, the four ninjas looked infuriated.

"Did he just..."

"Call us..."

"Power Rangers?"

Yugi looked on worried as Tristen stood up again, bleeding.

"YOU'RE DEAD!" shouted Joe as he charged forward.

It wasn't so much a fight as it was a massacre. Yugi, realizing that violence wouldn't work, went back to where Tea was and tried to make sure she was OK. It was about the only smart thing any of them did.

Kaiba moved in first to attack when he found his neck wrapped around by an odd yo-yo. The second he touched it, a powerful electric jolt rendered him unconscious.

Tristen was next on the list, as he began to punch Ryu in the chest. "Bring it on Green Ranger!"

After about five punches, none of which seemed to move the heavyset warrior, he lifted Tristen into the air with two hands.

"There are three things I hate. Not having enough food, world-dominating psychos, and being called a power ranger!"

"So, what are you gonna do about it?" Ryu responded by throwing Tristen into a nearby building, knocking him out cold.

"No one hurts Tristen!" shouted Joey as he began to run for Ryu, fists ready. Before he could do anything though, a bolo wrapped around his legs, tripping him to the ground.

"Nice work Jinpei," began Jun.

"He shouldn't have called us Power Rangers."

With the battle now over, Yugi walked out towards where he unconscious friends were.

"You want to fight too?" asked Joe as he readied several feather shurikens.

"No. I think this is all the result of a big screwup, with things not going the way they were supposed to. I'd be willing to help you get things back to normal."

Nodding, the ninjas all lowered their weapons as they went up to Yugi. "So, you have a plan?" asked Jinpei.

"Yeah. We just need to find where the girls threw those other authors off to. They started it, maybe they can stop it."

Jun smiled. "Sounds like a plan."
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: Gatchaman vs. Yu-Gi-Oh

choices: Go to Somedude and the others search for Drez and Wizard
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Doom thought for a few seconds. Leaving American Airspace? He had all the energy he needed, thanks to the Saiyan and his anger management issues. Leaving American Airspace would mean having to abandon his plot for today... and what was the worst this author could do? Then again, unleashing a world of hurt upon Freak Boy would not be a bad idea...

"I accept your agreement, Somedude." Doom said.

"YOU JUDAS!" Freak Boy shouted at Somedude.

"Hey, it's just payback for ditching me to go have sex with giantess Morigan." Somedude said with a smirk.

"Ohhh, those pictures are SO hitting the net." Freak Boy growls.

"SILENCE!" Doom barked, sending both Freak Boy and Somedude jumping. "Somedude, I shall take Freak Boy now and leave American Airspace when my job is complete."

"Job? What job?" Somedude asked.

"When I left Latveria, it was not just to get Freak Boy, but to put an end to this travesty of a giantess nightmare." Doom said.

"Fine then... shake on it." Somedude said, not trusting Doom, but knowing that of all the things Doom is, he is not a liar.

"Very well then." Doom says, extending a hand.

*Yes, I'll leave once my job is done. When I started my job may have been to stop the giantesses, but now that I have Kentenko's energy, I have enough energy to power a force so great, it will redefine the word army! The Doomsmen will conquer the world with Kentenko's power, and when I put the energy pack into my suit... I will become a literal God! Doom shall be unstoppable!* he thought to himself, shaking Somedude's hand with a malicious smile under that iron mask.

"Ok, he's all yours." Somedude said.

Doom snapped his fingers and two Doomsmen came in, each taking Freak Boy by an arm.

"I'm gonna kill you Somedude!!!" Freak Boy shouted, being carried away. "The Red Army will avenge me!!"

"Oh, give it a rest, Freak Boy." Somedude said, heading back to the God Phoenix.

As for Doom... he went back to the observation deck.

"Begin arming the Doomship's nuclear weapons as well as our smaller turrets. We are going to enter a full scale battle within the next 24 hours." Doom said, sitting on the throne in the deck.

"Yes, Lord Doom." said a Doomsman, issuing orders to the rest of the Doomsmen. "Lord Doom, what will become of Freak Boy?"

Doom paused, thinking of a punishment that would be appropriate... he smiled beneath that mask. "I will turn his dream into a horrid nightmare..."

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
The Doomsmen begin firing plasma charges at the authors.

"Time to go, Wiz." Freak Boy says. He begins running down the hall, then aims his hand back at the Doomsmen. He pulls his arm in then puts it out, as if cocking it, then the back of the suits hand opened up, revealing a sort of miniature lazer turret. Freak Boy cocked it again and it fired. He did this several times, firing plasma right back at them. (think super battle droids from Episode 2, as much as I hated that movie...)

"Where are we going?"

"We're going to get back to the 4th Internationale. The Air-Force and artillery will still be out there, but the soldiers are still going to need words of encouragement." Freak Boy responded.

"No! We have to find Drez!" Wizard said, stopping Freak Boy. Freak Boy turned and glared at him through the visor of his suit.

"You listen to me, until we're out of this mess, you listen to me! I am a General in the 4th Internationale and outrank you by a longshot, not to mention I'm the veteran author here, so you do as I say. Got it?" Freak Boy demanded. Wizard nodded, as Freak Boy was squeezing his throat rather tightly. The Doomsmen rounded the corner and began firing. "Good -- RUN!!"

======Meanwhile...======

Sure, Somedude felt bad about betraying his partner, but Freak Boy was resourceful. He'd find a way out of this mess. Right now their search for Drez was important, since Ken was only going to doom this fight even further if he took on the Doomship again.

======In the Bridge of the Doomship======

Doom watched as Ken powered up, accompanied by the giantesses who assaulted his planes. He smirked.

"Saiyan's... they'll never learn. I suppose I shall have to show him the meaning of true power." Doom said, heading down to get one of the battery packs. He loaded it into his suit and his eyes widened as the power coursed through it.

"Oh yes... I am once again a God!" Doom shouted. He walked to the exit of the ship and appeared on top of it.

"Kentenko... I am Victor Von Doom. If you are feeling bold, or are just very stupid, then you may attack. You should know, though, that Super Saiyan Four or not... you don't stand a chance against Doom." he said. As much a braggart as Doom was, he could back up his smack talk and then some.

Ken smiled and the two became locked in a ferocious battle. SS4 was powerful, but had a downside; Saiyans have never been smart creatures and in SS1, 2 & 3, they can still be relatively intelligent. SS4 was much more a primitive state of destruction. Doom, on the otherhand, while retaining that same power, could still contemplate rational thought and formulate strategies which would work to his advantage--in this case, distract Ken long enough for the Doomship to begin extracting his energy again.

======Meanwhile... again======

"Look out!" Tea shouted, smacking a red plane down to the ground and away from Mai.

"These things are everywhere! Why can't the madness just end?!

As the two giantesses fought off the 4th Internationale's planes and Doom's planes, an explosion from the hull of the Doomship went un-noticed. Out of the hole in the ship propelled two authors, one of which was zooming off with jet-boots while the other clung to him tightly.

"Get your hands off my visor! I can't see!" Freak Boy shouted.

"Pull up! Pull up!" was all Wizard shouted.

Freak Boy spiraled around befor crashing into someone's cleavage. He groaned and opened his eyes to reveal his visor was cracked in the explosion and his left arm sustained adequate damage to prevent him from moving it for a while. Wizard was lucky, as Freak Boy took most of the impact.

A hand reached in and pulled them out. Freak Boy looked up weakly to see the face of...
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: The Great Escape

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
Freak Boy rubbed his head a bit. He couldn't tell what was in front of him, much less what was pulling him up. Of course, that was mostly because Wizard's arm was in front of him.

"Move it!"

Pushing the arm aside, Freak Boy realized what was holding him. A very large hand. He didn't even bother looking at the face of what held him, considering the consequences.

"You see what you did?!" shouted Freak Boy at Wizard. "Look what you've done!"

"ME!?" shouted Wizard. "I'm not the Mary Sue Super Sayain getting his ass kicked by Doom every two seconds!"

Poor Jean Grey, on the other hand, had no idea what in God's green Earth was going on. One second she was in the Danger Room doing her morning workout with Scott and Bobby, the next she found herself on a weird street where everyone had shrunk...or had she grown?

The answer wouldn't come from the bickering guys in each hand. They were so caught up in their own argument that they didn't even notice her.

That was hardly the case with the rest of the area. Dr. Doom, Kentenko, the now conscious Drez, Yugi, Somedude and the science ninjas, along with anyone else that I forgot to mention, gasped at the sight of a giantess appearing out of thin air.

"This is very bad..." began Somedude.

"No shit," replied Joe.

"We need to get back to the God Phoenix. Hurry!" The ninjas quickly took the air, leaving a puzzled Yugi behind.

"What about me?" asked Yugi.

As he flew away, Somedude replied. "Keep looking for Drez!"

"What do I do when I find him?"

"See what he can do about sealing these rifts!"

"What are you gonna do?"

"This battle space is getting way too crowded! We need to take out Kenteko so we can Doom back to working on the larger problem!"

"You have an idea for that?" asked Ryu.

"It'll come to me." Joe just shook his head.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.title: And now the problems really start.

choices: Jean composes herself and vows to help keep the universe in tact.
1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
"No, but if you had just done what I said and stopped this abomination of a story then we wouldn't be in this mess," Freak Boy shouted.

"You're the one who started the whole random GTS moments thing, so aren't you being a hypocrit on this matter," Wizard asked, quirking a brow.

Freak Boy began charging the Freak Boy Armor to launch forth an energy attack, but was stopped as the hand he was in closed around him. He shouted many expelatives and curses, but it was all muffled by Jean's giant hand.

"Ok, Mr...?"

Wizard looked up and saw the face of everyone's favorite X-Man--er... X-Woman, Jean Grey.

"My name's Wizard. And you're Jean Grey?"

"Yes, that's right," she said, only slightly nervous that he knew her name. Right now she wanted to know how the hell she got here and why everything was so small. "Mr. Wizard, please tell me where I am. Why is everything so small and - how did I get here?"

"Well... I'm not sure myself. This has happened before, but I think the guy in your hand can explain it better than I can," Wizard said, gesturing to her closed fist.

Jean nodded and opened her hand. Freak Boy was there in his sparking suit. He had removed the helmet to prevent his hair from catching on fire. He looked up at Jean and his eyes widened.

"Oh Lenin, not again," Freak Boy said with a groan.

"Uhm... I'm sorry," Jean said, sitting down on a hill and looking at the two authors inquisitively. "But Mr. Wizard said you would be able to tell me what's going on."

"It's not Mr. Wizard, just Wizard."

"Sorry."

Freak Boy sighed. He thought for a few seconds, then stood up. "I'll explain it, but I warn you it will be very lengthy and almost no one will understand a word of it, since the readers are all uneducated sex pervs."

"Uhm... ok?"


"Well, it goes like this--" because Freak Boy was right, I will not bother going into detail on his speech. You just need to know that it took up 25 pages of him discussing the theory of the space time continuum, the fact that when you crossover stories then you need to open a rift. When rifts are opened too often, it becomes increasingly difficult to permanently close them. This means that it will close for a while, but then tear itself open. He went into great detail about how the rifts get bigger and cause merges in dimensions which lead to disfigurations (such as Jean's size alteration) when people come out of dimensions when it happens enough and eventually leads to the destruction of the universe as we know it.

"--so then when dimensions merge with such violent results, it leads to a contest on the molecular level as to which dimensional structure will be accepted. When this begins to take place atoms split as they wage war, and as we all know splitting the atom leads to nuclear explosions. This means the universe would destroy itself in a matter of hours. That make sense?"

Jean sat, dumbfounded. If what he said was true then she was contributing to the destruction of the universe. She wouldn't let that happen. It was then she noticed Dr. Doom fighting someone from DBZ. This was strange for her, as Dr. Doom is one of the X-Men's sworn enemies, yet here he was fighting to keep the peace... most strange.

"Hello," Freak Boy interrupted her thoughts. "Jean? Earth to Jean? Come on, will you help us or not?"

"You think we can find Drez?" asked Wizard.

"Sure," replied Freak Boy. "I see someone down there alone. That has to be him."

Nodding, Jean took the three of them down to investiage. Unfortunately, it wasn't Drez.

"Yugi? What are you doing here?"

Jean blinked. "Yugi? As in the short kid from that show about the card..."

"Don't ask," replied Freak Boy. "What are you doing here?"

"Looking for Drez," replied a worried Yugi. Wizard smiled.

"Oh! So are we! Where are the girls?"

"Unconscious. They got laid out by a missile from that blue jet."

"And the 4th Internationale?" asked Freak Boy.

"Well..."

**************************************************

"Comrade Lenin, how can this be possible? We were defeated again?"

"I do not know, Comrade Trostky," replied Lenin as he was forced into a millitary Humvee. "When the Doomship arrived and Freak Boy ran, our forces fell apart in the face of battle!"

"I told you this wouldn't work!" replied Yelstin. "There was a reason Communism collapsed in Russia."

"Shut up Yeltsin," replied the others.

**************************************************

"OK! So that only leaves us with Doom and the bird ninjas! This is great!" began Wizard.

"No it's not great!" angirly replied Freak Boy as he hit the ground. "The oppresive captalistic regime lives due to my own ignorance and negligence. And my own power...useless!"

Yugi shook his head. "I think we should worry about finding Drez first. With all the chaos and commotion, he could be in trouble. Not to mention he's probably our only chance of getting everything back to normal before more rifts open."

"Who told you about the rifts?" asked Jean.

"The Gatchaman."

"The who?"

"Somedude," corrected Freak Boy. "Where is he?"

"He went back to his jet with the other ninja-bird-thing people. Said the area was becoming chaotic."

As if on cue, a large piece of rubble from where the Ken/Doom fight was taking place flew towards them. Before it could hit them, Jean pushed it away with her telekentic ability.

"Well," she sighed, "at least my powers still work."

Freak Boy just continued walking, not bothering to respond.

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
They searched around for a while, going through the rubble caused by the Doomship, the giantesses, the 4th Internationale, etc. etc. Finally, they came across a beaten up author.

"Uh-oh... I think we found him," Freak Boy said.

"Drez! Little buddy," shouted Wizard, jumping off Jean's hand as she kneeled down. He ran forward to Drez.

"Skipper... is that you?" Drez asked with a smirk. Gulligan's Island was always fun to make fun of.

"Freak Boy, you've gotta help him!" Wizard said.

"Huh? Me?" Freak Boy asked.

"Are you sure that's a good idea, Wizard?" Jean asked, looking at Freak Boy. He was still in the Freak Boy Armor, minus the helmet of course.

"Freak Boy, you're a lawyer, a military strategist, a writer - hell, I'm beginning to doubt whether or not you don't just do whatever the hell you feel like. Now dammit, I know you've got some medical skills, so help Drez dammit!"

"Fine." Freak Boy pulled out a cell phone and hit a seemingly random sequence of digits. "...I need to upload three years of med-school. Now."

There was a flash and Freak Boy appeared in a white doctor's coat.

"Whoah... Matrix style."

"Ok, enough chat. Subject's pupils are glazed. Left eye is less responsive than right eye - possible concussion," Freak Boy said, examining Drez with lightning speed. "Subject appears to have lost massive amounts of blood, will need large amounts of blood, stat."

Wizard ran off to go jack some blood from the nearest bloodbank.

"Ungh..." Drez groaned, his eyes fluttering.

"Hey! Come on, stay with me Drez!"

Wizard showed up with O type blood, the universal donor.

"Ok, subject is bleeding internally and will need to be sedated for an operation."

"What kind of sedative will you need?" Jean asked. She had taken up the role of the nurse, getting things from the nearest hospital with th help of the staff.

"Marijuana should sufficiently sedate the patient for operation." Freak Boy said, dropping the professional air he had held about him. Jean, Wizard and Drez all stared at him.

"Pot?"

"Yeah, and... get it in a big bag. Like, oh... yay big," Frak Boy said, holding his hands about a backpack's length apart.

"We don't have time for this!" Jean barked. "Get serious! There is a life on the line and if he goes it's your fault, meaning you'll go too!"

Jean didn't mean any of the part about killing Freak Boy, but she needed to motivate him. She jabbed him with a large finger. Freak Boy grunted and finally relented.

"Fine, we need to operate though."

*****************************************************************
INSERT COOL MUSIC
*****************************************************************

'We can rebuild him... we have the technology.' Freak Boy's narration said as he and Wizard began operating.

'We can make him stronger... faster... authorer...'

Drez sat up. "Is 'authorer' a word?"

"We can make it one." Freak Boy said.

"We have the technology," Drez finished.

Jean just rolled her eyes.

1221122222221211121121212212112222211211.content:
It was about six hours since Kaiba went back to work on the formula. Although oblivious to the rapidly spreading parings forming outside that would rival a soap opera, Kaiba was more focused on the antidote in front of him. That, and making sure that the tape of him and Serenity didn't leave the island.

"Test 201D. Time, 11:00PM. Despite the seemingly random behavior of everyone on this island impeding me from my goal, it seems that I've finally finished creating the substance. First, I'm going to test it on plant life."

Carefully placing a drop of the new formula on the cells, Kaiba watched as it succesfully shrunk down the cell. He smiled. It was time to go get Pegasus.

As he walked down the hallway towards Pegasus' room, however, he began to hear something coming from then. Putting an ear to the door, he began to listen.

**************************************************

"So, the case is now in our possession, correct?"

"You're mistaken. There are three cases. We only have two."

"What about the others?"

"They won't matter in due time. Two cases are more than enough to proceed with the still-Earth operation."

"Then everything is going to..."

The sound was interrupted by Kaiba kicking over the door, ready to face whatever was in there. "PEGASUS!"

"What Kaiba? Is it crime for me to watch television in my own house?"

"Tele..."

Looking around, Kaiba saw no one in the room but Pegasus and the rather large television he was watching.

"Well, uh, Pegasus..."

"What?"

"The antidote is ready."

"It's his life. I can't tell him how to live it, or who to date."

Before anyone could debat the issue, Pegasus quickly got in front of them. "Well, this has all been very lovely, but you all have a plane to catch..."

"Plane?" asked Yugi.

"I arranged it so my private jet brings you back to Tokyo by tonight. But it leaves in one hour. Go, hurry now!" Pegasus' words of haste accented by him pushing everyone towards a nearby car.

"This car will take you to the runway. You'd better get going."

"But what about Kaiba?" asked Serenity.

"He'll get a ride. Hurry, run!" The door quickly closed as the car sped towards the runway, preventing anyone else from asking questions.

Later that evening...

Kaiba and Pegasus were in the dining room of the Duelist Kingdom castle, exchanging a meal of wine, bread, and cheese. Despite the seeming relaxed atmosphere such a meal would present, the mood in the room was anything but relaxed.

"Alright Kaiba, as promised, the one and only copy of you and the giantess engaging in lewd acts." Motioning to a servant, Pegasus handed the tape to him. The servant then quickly handed it over to Kaiba.

"And no other copies exist?" asked Kaiba between sips of wine.

"None at all. I'm not going to go back on my promise."

Kaiba smirked. "I have just one question."

"What's that?"

"Why did you help me come up with an antidote?"

Pegasus laughed at the question. "Two reasons Mr. Kaiba. The first is that now and forever, you will need to admit that you needed my help. The second, is that you unwittingly gave me a very powerful agricultural tool."

Kaiba winced. "What?"

"Reverse engineering a shrink formula and studying abnormal growth has given me the tools necessary for an agricutulral revolution. Thanks to you, Industrial Illusions now has a revoltuionary product, one bound to make the patent holder a great deal of money."

"WHAT?"

Pegasus continued to laugh as he stood up. "Well Kaiba, it's been fun, but I have a financial empire to rebuild!"

"Damn you Pegasus!"

**************************************************

"That pretty much ended the main portion of our story. Everyone got off the island safely, though their opinions of the events vary from person to person."

"Tea and Yugi are still dating, almost inseperable now. Go figure, right? Mai and Joey are... experiencing some trouble in their relationship. Both of them are, once again, too pig headed to admit that it's supposed to be an equal partnership. As for Kaiba and Serenity... Yeah right. That was never gonna happen, even in the most strange of fan fictions. Kaiba is way too much of a jackass for that."

"THE END." Somedude read aloud as he finished typing the last chapter in he and Freak Boy's latest story. He sighed.

"I did it... we're finally done." he said, standing up and heading towards his bed. He opened the door and climbed in bed, only to hear a knock at the door. He groaned. "Figures, they wait till you get all nice and comfortable, then knock on the door..." he said grumpily.

He made his way to the door and opened it to see Freak Boy standing there with two slices of bread.

"Hey, Somedude... you got any sandwich meat?" he asked, holding out the bread.

"You showed up at my house... at 2:30 in the morning to ask for sandwich meat?" Somedude asked, somehow not surprised.

"What? I'm hungry..."

"Well--go check the fridge!" Somedude said, heading for the bed again. Before he could, however, there was a loud crashing noise. Somedude turned around and where his fridge once was, there was nothing but a hole in the wall.

"What the hell was that?"

Somedude just shouted. "Dammit Lita, It's 3 in the morning!"

Freak Boy backed up a bit. "What in the hell was big enough to do that?"

"My girlfriend," replied Somedude.

"I think I'm gonna go now."

Somedude just groaned. "I need to write real fiction for a change."

1311.content:
Ash and Brock had regained their eyesight after the brilliant energy flash emitted by Clefairy. As Ash looked around, he could see Clefairy still standing in its place.

"Hmmm...? I wonder what that was all about?" Ash said.
"Yeah. It's like nothing ever happened. But where did Misty go?" Brock asked. Indeed, Misty wasn't standing in between the two guys anymore. Just then, Ash could suddenly hear Pikachu going into a frenzy, constantly shouting.

"Huh? What's wrong, Pikachu?" Ash asked. Pikachu then pointed up behinds it and made the two see something they hadn't seen before. A tremendous wall of red and white was blocking the path, but as they moved their eyes up, they could see the colors change. Finally, they could actually hear the wall speak.

"HEY! WHAT JUST HAPPENED TO ME!?" it shouted. Ash and Brock instantly recognized the voice, and as they finally looked up at the sky, they could see that it was indeed Misty! But she was gigantic, over 100 feet tall!!!
"Aaaahhh!!! Misty! What happened to you?" Ash shouted.
"It can't be! That Clefairy used Growth on Misty!" Brock said.
"Growth?" Ash asked.
"It's normally used to slightly increase the Pokemon's size so that it can both intimidate its opponent and use stronger attack power. It was never meant to be used on humans!" Brock said.
"So you're trying to tell me that this Clefairy was responsible for Misty growing to that big of a size?" Ash said.
"We might be able to reverse the effect if we command the Clefairy to use minimize." Brock said.
"All right! Let's try it! Clefairy, use Minimize attack!" Ash shouted. But instead of Misty, it was Clefairy who instead shrunk down to tiny size and ran off. Ash, Brock, and Pikachu all collapsed of embarrassment.

"GREAT. JUST GREAT. NOW HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO SHRINK BACK TO MY NORMAL SIZE?" Misty asked.
"Well, look on the bright side, Misty! At least your Pokemon grew with you!" Ash shouted.
"And your clothes too, though I personally would've preferred..." Before Brock could finish, Pikachu thundershocked him.
"Don't get any ideas, Brock..." Ash said.

"YOU TWO BETTER THINK OF A WAY TO RESTORE ME TO NORMAL, OR I'LL LITERALLY MAKE MINCEMEAT OUT OF YOU!" Misty shouted.
"Okay, Misty! Just take it easy. We'll think of something! Any ideas, Brock?" Ash asked.
"Well, Ecruteak City isn't too far from here. Maybe we can find some assistance there." Brock said.
"Good idea, Brock! Let's try that." Ash said.
"You better wait here for now, Misty." Brock said.
"HUH? WHY!?" Misty said.
"Well... we wouldn't want anybody to mistake you for an Onix. Even if you are bigger than one." Ash said.
"Ash is right, Misty. We can't risk you causing any trouble." Brock said. So with that, Ash, Brock, and Pikachu all proceeded towards Ecruteak City, leaving the 100-foot-tall Misty all to herself.

"SHEESH... WHY DO THEY ALWAYS HAVE TO BE SO PICKY? MAYBE THIS I'M THIS BIG NOW, I CAN TAKE MATTERS INTO MY OWN HANDS..." Misty said. She picked herself up from the ground and pondered where she could do next.

155221221212.content:
((Sorry for all the additions by me; I keep having ideas!))

Keiko slipped her feet out of the sandals she was wearing and took off her socks.

"Hey down there! I'd like a pedicure!" Keiko called, grinning merrily.

The people weren't sure what to do. Most just stood there still in shock.

"Well, alright," Keiko said. "I'll give you a choice. Those who are willing to do what I asked, stay there and start caring for my feet. Those who don't, stand over by my socks for your assignment." She grinned. "Oh, but leaving isn't one of the options." she finished with a giggle.

Yusuke was confounded by his girlfriends behavior. "Keiko, what are you doing?"

In response, she placed him between her breasts, beneath her clothes. "Just a little fun," she whispered to him. "Stay there ok? And you better enjoy it!" She said with a friendly tone, making Yusuke unsure if she was teasing or serious. She then made sure her clothes covered him so he couldn't see what happened.

Some of the crowd had started to polish her feet, but most had moved over by her socks. She could tell they were unsure of what to do, but everyone would understand soon enough.

"Alright, so I can pick you all up at once, you're going in one of my socks." She didn't wait for them to move on their own, but reached down with her giant hand and pushed them all in before picking up the sock. Then she spoke to those by her feet. "I'm glad to see some of you did as I said. Those who don't obey me will care for another need I have." She then put the opening of the sock by her mouth and tilted it so that everyone fell into her gaping maw. Keiko sighed happily as she savored their taste before swallowing the whole group alive. She was exhilarated by the squirming as they fell into her stomach. Those at her feet quickly redoubled their efforts.

"What did you do?" came Yusuke's muffled voice from her chest.

"Oh, those who didn't want to care for my feet are now giving me a massage." She didn't specify that the "massage" was the people pounding on the inside of her stomach, trying futilely to get out. "Now..."
155221221212.title: Give me a pedicure!

1552212212122.content:
Yusuke realized he had to reason with her. "Keiko, is this really what you want? I've never seen you act like this!"

Keiko was about to say yes when she stopped and thought. Was this going to alienate Yusuke? She thought about her dream and how it could happen while still keeping Yusuke. Then she realized something. 'I have men obeying me as I wanted... but I didn't want to kill anyone...' she thought, noticing the pounding in her stomach was barely noticable now. 'What is this potion doing to my mind?!' She then spoke to the tiny people down below. "Alright, that's enough for now, thank you. I'd like to be alone for now." As she walked off, she spoke to Yusuke in a quieter tone so only he could hear. "Thank you Yusuke. I have dreamed about this, but I never imagined I would react the way I did when it happened. Something is wrong."

"Are you going to tell me how you got this way? Maybe I we can figure out something."

Keiko sighed and realized it was for the best. She explained about the vendor at the Tournament, and how she had bought an enhancement potion.

Yusuke was incredulous. "How could you think a demon potion wouldn't have bad effects?! We need to talk to Koenma about this."

Keiko considered that. She could find Botan and enlist Spirit World's aid... but mightn't she get spiritual legal trouble?"
1552212212122.title: She wants private time with Yusuke.

15522122121221.content:
"Alright. Lets find Botan." Keiko agreed. But they didn't have to, because just then Botan came flying up to them on her oar.

"Keiko what in the three worlds happened to you?!" Botan exclaimed.

"Um... I..." Keiko stuttered. Yusuke explained: "She drank a potion she got from a demon at the tournament."

"Yusuke? Where... oh." Botan blushed a bit when she realized Yusuke's location. Then she regained her composure. "Keiko, demon potions usually have very bad effects on humans! Wait... please tell me you're not the one who caused all those traumatized souls to arrive in Spirit World!"

"I... didn't mean to.. this potion was supposed to make be grow, but I think its doing something to my mind."

Yusuke couldn't believe it. "Keiko... you killed people?!"

She glanced nervously at Botan. "Um, I think I stepped on some. Its hard not to." Hearing this, Yusuke relaxed, believing it had been an accident. Botan knew they had died in Keiko's stomach rather than underfoot, but took the hint and didn't explain.

"Well," Botan continued quickly, "I should take the potion back to Spirit World to have them find out what's really in it." Without thinking, Keiko defensively clutched at her breast pocket where the potion vial was. Botan noticed this. "B-but not all of it! You should keep some with you... withdrawl symptoms can sometimes be worse." Botan took a small sampling cup out of the Spirit Detective Kit she always carried. "Please, Keiko. Pour a bit in here so we can find out how to counteract it."

Keiko shook her head, causing a wind that made Botan nearly fall off her oar. "No! I've always dreamed of being so big and powerful!"

Yusuke didn't understand fully, but agreed with Botan. "Keiko, please. Even if you keep your size, we have to find out what it is doing to your mind." Keiko saw the logic in this and agreed.

After acquiring the sample, Botan said, "I'll be back with answers as soon as I have some. Meanwhile, Keiko, try to stay rational, and Yusuke... have fun in there!" She flew off giggling while Keiko turned beet red.

"I'm Raiza....the Dream-Fairy where i invade people's personal and private fantasy worlds..." There was a hint of sarcasm in the voice put Sakura didn't pick it up

Raiza just stared at the girl. " I was kiddin about that..."

"Why I'm here...is because I'm suppose to give you this."

He revealed his hand to her revealing a scroll.


"This scroll is of an ancient jutsu duiring a era of battle of gods. The power held within them shall grant you power over size, beauty, and muscle. For you..Either be a Amazon size lady or ...be a Goddess or however big you wish to be.

"Okay...that sounds neato but this is still just a dream!" Sakura told the shadowy figure.

"My time is up. Use your Godly jutsu with care Sakura"


He then began to walk away slowly diappearing from sight 'bullshit that's gonna happen.....sometimes i question the Gods actions....maybe this is just from the God of Destruction or Goddess Athena hoping for her to be a peace-kepper or something...I dunno,don't care'

She just stared blanky at it.And began to wonder what to do next....
155222222222211.title: Jutsu from the God Era

choices: Yes, she'll be well over the top of Shino's hair by morning
No, but she will grow more muscular
1552222222222111.content:
"What's going on here?" Sakura thought, slipping out of bed. She took the scroll and placed it on her desk and turned on the desk lamp. She sat down and opened the scroll. It read, "For those who seek to invoke my power, you shall see it with in the hour. Blessed unto you from me shall be a power for all to see. In five sun rises, this scroll is gone. It's powers all, in you alone. To make others like yourself, if you need. But the following warning, do take heed: Open the gates to far, and you shall quickly touch your farthest star. Upon coming to this line, it has begun, the power transfer to you from mine. Lying within you, a power awaits. To feel it more, open the gates." Sakura finished reading the scroll and shook her head.

"I had never read something that intensely before," she thought. She saw she had placed her hands on the scroll. When she removed them, they felt warm. "But what that scroll said can't be true," she thought getting up and walking back to bed. " But then how did I get the scroll anyway? If it was, then I'm still dreaming now. If not, I would like to be a bit taller. Being one of the weakest of the Rookie 9 sucks." She sighed sitting on her bed. As she did, she closed her eyes and saw a giant gate before her. A silver mist emitted from between the bars and enveloped Sakura. When Sakura opened her eyes in fright, she saw that her shirt was tighter on her and her legs were showing more from the pants.

"It can't be," she thought, walking to the window sill. She had always used it as a measuring benchmark for her. Not two minutes before, she was even with her old mark. Now she was a head over it. "This is too much to handle," she thought before collapsing on her bed.

Would her desire make her grow more through the night?
1552222222222111.title: The inscription and gates.

15522222222221112.content:
As Sakura slept on, her body changed to meet her desire: To be stronger and not one of the weakest of the Rookie 9. Her arms slowly expanded, adding good size muscles all around. Her abs became a six pack without flexing. Her clothes however, were not able to change with her and ripped around her chest, arms, and legs. But Sakura still slept on, finally getting to the wedding and honeymoon she has missed out before.

Dawn broke on Konoha and like many others, Sakura woke up to the sun on her face. She opened her eyes and looked at the ceiling.

"What strange dreams I had," she thought, sitting up, "Like anyone could . . .get . . .taller." In mid thought, Sakura saw that what happened the previous. Her clothes were ripped and her muscles had grown greatly.

"No way," she said quietly, touching her arms together. She pulled them away, realizing they too had grown. "This can't be real," she thought pinching her arm with one hand. It hurt. Sakura stood up and walked to her full length mirror to better see her new self. She knew she was no longer the weakest member of her squad or any genin squad for that matter. In truth, despite being shocked at this event, she only had one regret.

"Shame my bust didn't increase," she muttered, "It would be nice to be bigger than Hinata as well." She closed her eyes again and as before, saw the gate and the same mist come from it, enveloping her. She opened her eyes and smiled. Where before her shirt was merely ripped from her muscular chest, now it was destroyed by rising breasts on her body. Sakura turned to the side and was ecstatic. "If Sasuke wants a powerful woman to be his wife, I think I can accommodate that now," Sakura said before looking at the scroll. "You, I'll keep with me to keep safe, but first, I need some new clothes. Or do I?"
15522222222221112.title: Grow Sakura, grow

Sakura went through her wardrobe to find anything she could wear. "Hmm," she thought, "Every shirt is way to small up top, but it doesn't have to cover it all." She pulled out the under armor mesh she sometimes wore and ripped it down the seam. She then wrapped it around her ample chest, covering it and only it. She took a second garment and made a similar loincloth around her waist.

"Thankfully my belt still fits," Sakura thought putting it on, so she could take her side pouch with her. In the pouch she put the scroll. "Now, who to find first? Ino-pig or Sasuke?"

1552222222222111221.content:
"I think Ino needs to see the new me, so she knows not to touch my Saskue," Sakura decided, leaving her room. She marveled at how everything in her house was smaller now. "This is really enjoyable," she thought exiting her home, "And I can always get bigger."

As she walked down the street in her sandals, which barely fit her anymore, everyone's eyes went to her, including a few members of the ANBU Black Ops, who went off to inform Tsunade of Sakura's new body. Soon she reached Ino's flower shop and looked into it. Ino was there, alone.
"Perfect," Sakura thought, opening the door and walking in. "Morning Ino-pig," she said happily as she walked forward. Ino stared at Sakura and couldn't believe it was her.

"What happened to you?" Ino demanded, "How could you go from that short nothing to this overnight?"

"I had a really good dream," Sakura said, towering over Ino. Ino looked scared and quickly placed her hands together.

"Kia" Ino said, trying to end a genjutsu she hoped existed to explain Sakura's new form. She opened her eyes and Sakura laughed.

"This is no joke Ino," Sakura said, lifting Ino up with one hand to eye-level, "This is the real deal."

"It can't be," Ino said, "There's no possible way for this to be." But as she spoke, she saw the wall move behind Sakura. Ino glanced down and saw tha the floor was getting father away, but she remained at eye-level with Sakura.

"Told you it was real," Sakura said, "Now that we both know it is, remember this: Sasuke is mine. Actually, let me add something to that: Sasuke is mine and you can't have any guy without my say so." With her leg, Sakura smashed the counter Ino was working at like cardboard paper. "Are we clear?" Ino gave a silent nod and was dropped to the floor. She looked up at Sakura and quivered in fear as her head was just inches away from touching the ceiling. "Later, Ino-chan," Sakura said before leaving. "Now to find Sasuke."

Elsewhere at Tsunade's office, Tsunade was told of Sakura. "I see, send for her immediately," Tsunade said to one ANBU, "Let's see what's causing this."

Elsewhere still, Naruto and Sasuke were training in a field, unaware of what was going on with their teammate. "Is that all you got?" Sasuke asked, "You get me up at dawn and force me to fight with you?"

"Hey, you're out of breath too," Naruto said, "Besides it's not like we have anything better to do."

"True," Sasuke conceded, "One more round?" Naruto eagerly got up in his fighting stance.

15522222222221112211.content:
"I must be near eight feet tall," Sakura thought, after her last growth upwards, "I hope Sasuke likes tall women." But despite Sakura looking all over the town, she couldn't find him or even Naruto for that matter.

"Where are they?" she mumbled. But as she was about to lose hope, she saw someone who might be of some help. Behind the corner of a building, Sakura saw Hinata Hyuuga looking around. Smiling, Sakura approached Hinata.

"Sakura?" Hinata thought, "How did she get like that? Naruto will be all over her now. Why is my life so unfair?" Sakura reached the young Hyuuga and kneeled down so she could better talk with her in private.

"Hey Hinata, have you seen my teammates around? I want to show Sasuke my new body," Sakura said. Hnata, just a bit intimidated by Sakura's size, decided it was best not to lie.

"Yes, Sasuke and Naruto-kun were in the training field this morning, I just happened to pass by them," Hinata said, blushing and severing eye contact when she mentioned Naruto's name. Sakura laughed a bit.

"You like Naruto, don't you?" Sakura asked.

"W-w-w-w-hat do you mean by that?" Hinata asked, going as red ad Sakura's old shirt. Sakura just stared down Hinata until she answered timidly, "Yes."

"And would you like to be stronger than Neji?" Sakura whispered into Hinata's ear. Hinata looked at Sakura.

"Is she offering what happened to her, to be done to me?" She thought, "With that size, Neji and my father would be nothing. Sakura's always been after Sasuke, so even if Naruto likes the new her, he'll still be free for me." "Yes," she replied more confidently than before. Sakura smiled.

"Good," she said, placing the small girl on her shoulder, "We have some talking to do before getting to that field."

----------------------------------------------------------

Sometime later, Sakura was walking up the path to the training field. As she approached, she heard a voice cry, "Fireball jutsu!"

"That's Sasuke's voice," Sakura thought, running up the path. In the field, near the tree line, Sasuke and Naruto stood, both looking exhausted.

"Not bad, for a fool," Sasuke said. Naruto shook his head.

"When will you accept ---- SAKURA!" Naruto said, before seeing Sakura coming from behind.

"Sakura, what are you blathering about?" Sasuke asked, before Naruto just pointed his finger behind the young Uchiha and he saw the tremendous pink haired girl approach.

"Hey Sasuke," Sakura said, squatting down, "How do I look?" Sasuke was at a lose for words.

"You look great!" Naruto said, hoping that would earn him some points with the new Sakura.

"Thanks Naruto," Sakura said truthfully, "But you and I are just friends. There is someone more deserving of you. Just go to the tree line and find them."

"But," Naruto started.

"Naruto, either you'll walk over there or I'll throw you over there," Sakura said, smiling and flexing her muscles.

"Right," Naruto said, before leaving.

Sakura looked at Sasuke and smiled. "You never answered my question," she said.
15522222222221112211.title: Sakura finds her teammates in the field

155222222222211122112.content:
Naruto was moving quickly. He knew the new Sakura was not one to mess around with. He looked on the path for someone, but didn't find them. He did hear some crying from behind some bushes and went to investigate. When he looked over, he saw the hair of Hinata.

"Hinata?" Naruto called out. In shock, Hinata stood up. But it took her more time than normal as Naruto saw. Hinata had become much like Sakura: taller, more muscular, and well endowed. Her outfit was like Sakura's. She turned and saw the tiny Naruto.

"Hello," she said quietly.

"What happened to you?" Naruto asked.

"Sakura made me this way," Hinata said, walking forward, Naruto had to crane his neck back just to keep eye contact. Hinata quickly squatted down. "Do you like me this way?"

When she squatted, Naruto was looking right at her breasts and from shock, moved backwards. Naruto looked over Hinata. In the back of his mind, Naruto had planned out that if Sakura was meant for Sasuke, Hinata would make a good second. He did find her cute before. Now, she was still cute and then some. Naruto looked Hinata in the eyes.

"Yeah, I do," Naruto said. Hinata, forgetting all shyness, forgetting her new size and strength, reached out and hugged Naruto. Had it not been for her hugging him into her breasts, this would of been a different sort of pain. He quickly came to like this position and didn't complain.

What happened?" Naruto yelled, now realizing Hinata was close to 20ft tall.

155222222222211122112221.content:
"You and Sakura of course," Naruto said.

"Smart boy," Hinata said, putting him on her shoulder, "Hold on." With her new body and muscles, Hinata raced to the larger giantess to tell of Naruto's support.

Sakura stood at the base of the village, nude, beautiful, powerful, and pissed off. "Remember Sasuke," Sakura said to her captive, "This is all your fault." She turned her eyes to the village and saw they very stunned. "People of the Leaf, by the powers of some other being, I am now a Goddess. To be exact, your Goddess. I will help protect you if you promise to serve me. Some of you will be granted a gift for servitude. As I am too large for the village, I'll wait here for your envoy. My acolyte will escort you to me, Lady Tsunade. You have one hour to decide." Sakura took a few steps back and sat down. When she sat, Hinata ran up to her.

"My Goddess, Naruto will help us!" she said. Sakura turned her head, smiling at Hinata and the tiny boy on her shoulder.

"Traitor!" Sasuke yelled from Sakura's closed hand.

"No I'm not, my dream is to help protect this village. Sakura has given them a choice to be protected by her and her new power," Naruto said, "So why shouldn't I support her?"

"You're not as dumb as people say, Naruto," Sakura said.

"Told you," Hinata said. She then kissed Naruto. Sakura felt a twinge of envy. Had she accepted Naruto's love, she would have a man beside her s she was taking over.

"Well, I van take him later," Sakura thought. She looked at her two followers.

"Hinata, take Naruto and go see how the talks are going," Sakura commanded, "And be sure to spread word of my kindness."

What now?
155222222222211122112221.title: Sakura all the way

1552222222222111221122212.content:
"Now Sasuke, you'll pay," Sakura said. Sasuke went white with fear as Hinata and Naruto departed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --

Naruto rode on Hinata's shoulder as they reached the village streets. The new couple was stared at by varying stares, some of anger some of fear, and some had a twinge of secret desire to serve the new Goddess and gain some power like that. Those with the twinge were mostly women. "So, how has your vision been altered?" Naruto asked as Hinata walked slowly down the street. She didn't want to hurt anyone seeing as the deal was still on the table.

"It's increased a lot," Hinata said, "I can see over 1,000 yards away."

"Amazing," Naruto said, "So, uh, did you use your byakugan on Sakura at all today?"

"Actually, I did, before I joined with her," Hinata said, "Inside, her chakra was a brilliant gold not of this world."

"Very cool," Naruto said. Soon they reached the Hokage's Headquarters and knocked on the door.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------

"I thought I told you to bring her in," Tsunade said to the ANBU Captain, "Now she's proclaiming to be a Goddess. This may not end well." Tsunade had just heard Sakura's command. She was staring out the window, watching the 20 foot tall Hinata coming in. "So that Hyuuga girl is her acolyte?"

"I'm sorry Lady Hokage, but she must of sensed us coming after her and she vanished with the Hyuuga girl," the Captain explained, "We couldn't follow her." Tsunade looked back from the window at those present. The Jounin-sensei's Kakashi, Asuma, Guy, and Kurenai were there along with Jiraiya, and Utatane Koharu and Mitokado Homura from the Leaf's council.

"Well, you know her best Kakashi, what do you say?" Tsunade asked.

"Sakura's one to sometimes over react when angry," Kakashi said, "But this time I doubt even if she was, would that change her power."

"So you suggest we surrender?" Koharu asked coldly.

"Possibly," Kakashi said. The other Jounin were a bit taken back by the clam nature Kakashi spoke in. "Look at it this way, if Sakura can grow not just herself but others, then all she'd need is a few women to join her and her acolytes would probably destroy a greater part of this village quickly."

"This is really bad," Asuma said.

"It's only bad if she wants the extreme from us," Jiraiya said, "If the deal's good, the Leaf Village could really grow from it. We're still low on funds after the invasion, so if having a few giantesses around to defend our boarders or do missions brings in more money, is it really a bad thing?"

"You just like it because the women who grow would be easier to be peeked at," Tsunade said when there was a sudden shaking of the building. "I guess Hinata's here," Tsunade said.

Tsunade walked out of the office and to the main doors and opened them. Seeing the 20 foot tall giantess from a distance was one thing. Seeing her up front was a little shocking. But what got Tsunade most shocked was Naruto sitting on Hinata's shoulder. Hinata then sat down, so they would talk move evenly. The others soon joined Tsunade.

"Naruto," Tsunade growled a little angry. "I see you chose what side to work on."

"Lady Tsunade, I'm on the side that best helps the village I care about," Naruto said, "I was with Hinata when she went from 7 feet tall to this height. And we were a good distance away. With that in mind, I don't see how anyone could really defeat her if she could grow herself that big. I doubt even the Kyuubi could win against her." Naruto said, stroking his belly. Tsunde and Jiraiya knew exactly what Naruto was talking about.

"The sly kid, he's suggesting that the Death God jutsu might beat her," Jiraiya thought, "And no one but Tsunade, the council members and I know the jutsu's activation procedures."

"So you're saying we should give in?" Tsunade asked.

"No Lady Hokage," Hinata said, "What we're saying is it would be wise to listen to my Goddess' proposal. Truthfully, she was going to approach this matter in a calmer manner, but something happened to anger her."

"And what was that?" Tsunade asked.

"Sasuke said the wrong thing to her," Naruto said.

"Why am I not surprised?" Kakashi thought, while Tsunade was weighing the situation's new info.

"All right, I'll come with you to see Sakura," Tsunade said. "Kakashi and Jiraiya will accompany me. The rest of you, stay on alert."

"Lady Tsunade, are you sure this is wise?" Homura asked.

"She might try something," Koharu added.

"I'm Hokage. This is my decision," Tsunade said before she was suddenly picked up by the Giantess Hinata and placed on her other shoulder. "Hey! Ask first!" Tsunade said, striking Hinata's arm.

"Nice punch Lady Hokage, I might bruise from it," Hinata said smiling. Tsunade was shocked. Even if it wouldn't break the arm, it should of done more than a possible bruise. Those present felt even more worried about not taking the offer. Hinata then started walking off, back to the Goddess Sakura.
1552222222222111221122212.title: Which way will the Leaf fall?

choices: Indirect way: Go and find me some worthy acolytes, leaving Naruto here
directly:  I want to speak with Naruto alone.
15522222222221112211222121.content:
As Hinata approached the training field where Sakura was, she said, "Have the ANBU stop follwoing us, my Goddess may not like eavesdroppers." Tsunade looked at Hinata. Kakashi and Jiraiya exchanged worried glances.

"Damn Byakugan," Tsunade thought, "Of all the people to ally first, Hiashi why didn't you treat your daughter better?" Tsunade and Naruto looked around for Sakura, but she was no where to be found.

"Down here," Sakura said. All eyes went down to a tree and from behind it was Sakura, still nude, but only 9 feet tall.

"My Goddess, why did you shrink?" Hinata asked, kneeling before Sakura to honor her and to let her passengers off.

"It's easier to be reasonable when you're talking with someone close to your size. The giant form was just to get my message heard," Sakura answered. She turned to Tsunade. "Thank you for coming," she said.

"You're welcome," Tsunade said, "Just before we start, where's Sasuke Uchiha?"

"Tied upside down to a tree using my hair as rope," Sakura said, "He called me a steroid freak."

"I see," Tsunade said, "Will you release him?"

"Depending on how this meeting goes," Sakura said, sitting on the ground. Now she was about as tall at Tsunade standing. They looked into the others' eyes. "So have you thought on this proposal?" Sakura asked.

"Yes, but I first want to know some things," Tsunade replied.

"How did I get this new power?" Sakura asked.

"Yes and would you want to conquer the other villages to spread your influence?" Tsunade asked.

"Well, the second one I'm not sure on," Sakura said, "But as for this, it came to me in a dream."

"What do you mean?" Tsunade asked.

"Well, I had a dream where a dream fairy came and interrupted my dream where I marry Sasuke and he bestowed upon me a gift that granted me this Godly power," Sakura said.

"I see," Tsunade said, "Now for the proposal at hand, what exactly do you mean when you said those things? To worship you?"

"Oh just being nice to me, nice to my friends, no insulting me, and a once a week prayer for me to protect the village," Sakura said.

"Everything but the last sounds decent," Tsunade said.

"I thought so, I won't force the last one, but it would be nice, since I can chance size at will or anyone's size for that matter," Sakura said. smiling. In her mind, the gates opened. But It wasn't Sakura or Hinata who grew. Jiraiya and Kakashi stood behind Tsunade as the meeting went on. They were shocked and jumped back when Tsunade literally busted out of her clothes, her body grew to eight feet tall and body was restored what it would of been had she never used the Creation Rebirth Jutsu.

During the transformation, Tsunade was in a trance. When she awoke, she felt her permanent illusion was gone. She touched her smooth skin.

"What?" Tsunade said quietly.

"A gift from me," Sakura said, "For coming back and becoming a really great Hokage."

"Wow, Sakura may of violated Tsunade for growing without asking, but this will probably play a huge favor for Tsunade taking the deal. Sakura never even showed any signs of it, just smiling and then Tsunade grew," Jiraiya said.

"I think it would be wise to take Sakura's deal, excluding the weekly prayer clause," Tsunade said. Sakura giggled.

"All right, only if things get bad will I demand that," Sakura said. Tsunade nodded and turned around. "Let's go back to the village," she said. She and Jiraiya left the group, Jiraiya having to keep up with Tsunade's longer strides.

"Oh Sakura, mind if I retrieve Sasuke?" Kakashi asked.

"Sure," Sakura said, "I'm still mad at him, so tell him to keep away from me."

"Fine," Kakashi said before disappearing. Hinata smiled and started to bend down to pick up Naruto.

"Wait Hinata," Sakura said. She looked at her first acolyte. She cared about her and wanted her to be happy. But being the Goddess, she had the higher right to be happy. She wanted to talk with Naruto and see how he felt about moving up in the world. Now I can go about it directly or indirectly.

"What is it, my goddess?" Hinata asked.
15522222222221112211222121.title: A new alliance

155222222222211122112221212.content:
"I want to speak with Naruto alone," Sakura said.

"But why? He hasn't done anything wrong," Hinata said, "He might of even helped out before."

"I know," Sakura said, "Don't worry, I won't punish him or anything. I just want some questions answered, that's all."

"I don't mind answering some questions," Naruto said.

"All right," Hinata said, still not completely trusting of what was going on. But she still left the two alone.

"She's far enough away," Sakura said, before looking down at Naruto. "Let's walk this way," Sakura said, walking one way into the woods by the stream.

"You can tell?" Naruto asked.

"Yeah, anyone I grow, I seems to know where they are," Sakura said, "So I have to ask you Naruto, why did you want to be Hokage?"

"To earn everyone's respect and protect the village," Naruto said.

"And you now feel I can help do that? Despite my new freaky powers?" Sakura asked.

"Yes," Naruto said, "Besides, I would of supported you even without Hinata's persuasion."

"Because we were team mates?" Sakura guessed.

"No, because I was labeled a freak for many years, remember?" Naruto asked, "Being alone is really horrible. But when Iruka and others started befriending me, my life got better. I'd never want a friend to live through that pain." Sakura stopped moving and looked at Naruto as he walked on. She knelt down.

"Naruto, would you mind telling me why you were an outcast?" Sakura asked. Naruto turned around, realizing Sakura stopped.

"Well, not many are supposed to know this, but I think you could be an exception," Naruto said, raising his shirt and focusing his chakra. The seal of the Kyuubi appeared.

"Naruto, what's that?" Sakura asked.

"The seal that contains the Kyuubi within my body," Naruto said, "I'm its container. People, however, only saw me as the mini version of it."

"But no one ever. . ." Sakura said.

"The Third forbade any one to speak of it, but that didn't stop them from hating me," Naruto said. Naruto looked away to hide some tears. Sakura also felt sad.

"Naruto, before any of this happened, who did you like better, Hinata or me?" Sakura asked. "And I want you to be honest with me."

"You," Naruto said, "Because, well, both of you are cute. Hinata had the bigger top, but you were still very good looking. But you would also punish me for doing stupid things. Looking back, I needed that those times. Looking back, I didn't see Hinata having the same outwardness to stopping me from doing stupid things. It would of been nice, but I wouldn't of grown half as much."

"Naruto, thanks for those kind words," Sakura said, reaching out and hugging the little man. When she stopped, she looked Naruto in the eyes. "Tell me, would you like to still have me over Hinata?" Naruto's eyes went wide. Then narrowed.

"Wait, am I just the rebound from Sasuke?" Naruto asked.

"What? How could y-y-y-you. . ." Sakura said startled, but a glare from Naruto made her honest. "You were going to be. But after this talk, I think I could grow to like you on a much deeper level than Sasuke and I would of ever gone." Naruto blushed.

"And you would of just taken me from Hinata?" Naruto asked.

"Probably," Sakura said, "Oh all right, yes." Naruto sighed.

"Sakura, if you want people to like you and enjoy your rule, such selfish acts would only hurt you," Naruto said, "Why don't we see how things go between Hinata and me. We may just end up being really good friends. Maybe not. Wouldn't it be fairer to do it that way?"

"I guess," Sakura said, "Geez Naruto, how could you get even me to bow to your ethics?"

"I have a gift for it," Naruto said. Both laughed. During the laugh, Hinata returned.

"What's so funny?" she asked.

"Oh, I was just joking how it was a shame she didn't have this during our first big mission," Naruto said.

"Yeah, I was pretty useless back then," Sakura said, looking up at the 20 foot Hyuuga. Hinata knelt down.

"So, what were you talking about?" Hinata asked.

"Oh, uh," Naruto started.

"Just his reasons for joining us, that's all," Sakura said, smiling. She didn't approach Naruto while talking, "What he felt I could do to help out and all that."

"So, why did I need to leave? Unless you asked something you didn't want me to hear?" Hinata asked. Her voice had both sadness and anger in it.

"Hinata, Naruto never asked what I asked you before you swore loyalty to me," Sakura said, "This was information I wanted to know and wouldn't share with anyone. Please don't force Naruto to answer."

"But what's so wrong? If he told you. . . " Hinata stated.

"I have a relationship with Naruto you can't copy," Sakura said, "We almost died on the that big mission and in the Forest of Death. Because of those times, there's a bond between us." Hinata looked very saddened from this revelation. Naruto approached Hinata and touched her elbow, as he couldn't get any higher.

"Hinata, I hope one day I'll be comfortable enough to speak about those things to you," Naruto said, "But it's not just Sakura, Kakashi-sensie and Sasuke were there as well. It's the type of bond that develops between close comrades. All right?"

"All right," Hinata said, "So, what do we do now?"

"Well, you could go and see your cousin for a rematch?" Sakura said.

"Oh that would be fun," Hinata said.

"Well, I'm hungry, so I think I'll get something to eat," Naruto said, "I'll be at the Ichiraku. And then my house." Naruto then left the two girls.

"My goddess," Hinata said, "Do you plan on taking Naruto from me?"

"If I planned on doing it, what would you do?" Sakura asked calmly.

"I'd try and attack you," Hinata said.

"I see. Well, I don't plan on it. I don't want to be a selfish ruler. So I won't force you two apart. But I will tell you that Naruto was and is a close friend to me," Sakura then grew herself to 25 feet tall, while shrinking Hinata to 10 feet tall, "If I find you are keeping him yours by means of my gift, I'll be very displeased." The sudden change in height difference unnerved Hinata.

"Understood," Hinata said before leaving to find Neji. Sakura smiled and laid back on the ground.

"This has been a very good day," Sakura thought, "I feel so comfortable right now, I could just sleep." But what does she dream of tonight?
1552222222222111221122212122.title: Words not spoken

15522222222221112211222121221.content:
Sakura was standing on top of the Hokage mountain, towering high above the village. She stood a tall 100 feet even. Down below, the citizens were facing her and bowing to her. Tsunade, Hinata, Shizune and other women stood 20 feet tall near the back, smiling as well.

"Hail Goddess Sakura!" they yelled to her, "May she watch over us and protect us." She beamed at the prayer to her.

"Thank you, and I will," Sakura yelled back to them. "May your missions bring strength to our village we all love." She turned and left on the back side of the mountain.

"Now all we need to do is visit the Sand Village to see Lord Gaara and Temari," Naruto said, riding on Sakura's shoulder, smiling.

"That will probably take half a day at this size," Sakura said, "And then we can finally rest."

"Yeah, it's still hard to believe ten years have passed since you became a Goddess, five since you founded your empire," Naruto said, "And only three since you became my wife." Sakura looked at her left hand and the huge metal band on it. She smiled remembering how happy she was when Naruto asked.

"Yeah," Sakura said, "You've made me so happy. And you'll make a great father too."

"I'm just thankful the child grows with you to keep safe," Naruto said, "It makes me feel much safer knowing that."

"Me too," Sakura said, 'Now if we would only wake up."

Suddenly in two locations far from the other, two people woke up in the middle of the night, sweating from what they just dreamed.

Naruto looked around. He was still 12 years old and not the grown man he dreamed he was. "What was that?" he wondered.

Sakura had a similar wake up. She shook her head. She moved her hand to her forehead. As she did, she knocked down a tree or two. This caused her to look around. "I'm huge," Sakura said, "I'm 100 feet tall, like in that dream. What was that dream? Could it be the future? Maybe I should go find Naruto."
15522222222221112211222121221.title: Dreams or Premonitions?

155222222222211122112221212211.content:
"I need to see if Sakura had that dream as well," Naruto thought, "It felt so real. I just have to know." He opened his door and raced out down the streets. Little did he know, Hinata was planning a midnight rendezvous with Naruto and almost got to his place when she saw him bolt out of there.

"Where's Naruto-kun going?" Hinata wondered, "The only thing that was is . . .Sakura." Tears began to fill Hinata's eyes as well as an anger towards Naruto and Sakura. "I have to know what this is about," she concluded before racing after Naruto.

Sakura had shrunk herself back to a comfortable nine feet tall. "I'm going to see Naruto," she thought, "I have to know if he dreamed the same thing," Sakura thought before hearing something approach her location. She hid behind a tree and waited.

Naruto came to the training field and saw a massive butt imprint from where Sakura once sat. "Wow," Naruto said, before looking elsewhere. He came to a tree and saw Sakura's pink hair shine in the moonlight. "Sakura," Naruto said, "You awake?"

"Oh what do I say?" Sakura wondered. It took her a moment before coming out. "Just relieving myself. What's up?" she asked the shorter shinobi.

"Did you have a dream tonight?" Naruto asked quietly. Sakura's eyes widened.

"What sort of dream?" Sakura asked. "I'm not going to tell first," she thought.

"Well, you were in it and the entire village was praying to you," Naruto said.

"You;ll need to be a bit more specific Naruto," Sakura said, "That type of dream comes to me all the time, even before I got this power."

"Well, um, uh . . ." Naruto started, his voice now a low whisper only Sakura could hear, "You . .and I. . . were . .m-m-m-maried?" But Sakura moved closer and covered his mouth. She nodded. Naruto wanted to say more but Sakura's hand was overing too much.

"Shh," she quietly, "Someone's else is here." She looked into the woods. "Come out Hinata," she called.

Hinata tried hard hearing what Naruto was about to say. But he went to quiet. And then Sakura felt her presence. "Crap" Hinata thought, "What do I do?"
